loans.name: Patricio

texts.es: El señor Patricio es chofer y trabaja con un minibús de transporte de pasajeros junto a su esposa. El crédito lo requiere para el mantenimiento de su movilidad (cambio de aceites y fluidos, chequeo del motor y la caja de cambios, chequeo de frenos y pastillas). Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Villa ingenio en la ciudad de El Alto;  es casado   y tiene cinco hijos. Patricio es cliente de IMPRO desde el año 2008 y su historial de pagos es muy bueno.
texts.en:
Sr. Patricio is a driver who works with his wife transporting passengers in a minibus. The loan he is requesting will be used for maintenance of his vehicle (oil and fluid change, engine tune-up, and a check-up of the brakes and pads). Patricio lives in his own home in the District of Villa Ingenio in the city of El Alto. He is married and has five children.

Patricio has been a client of IMPRO since 2008 and his payment history is very good.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance of his minibus.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es: Doña Josefa de 29 años, casada con dos hijos. Su esposo trabaja independiente mente vendiendo verduras en el cenma mercado de la capital Guatemala, uno de sus hijos estudia, doña Josefa vende ropa típica como cortes, güipiles, cortes, blusas etc. En frente del mercado municipal de su comunidad, vende solamente los días de mercado desde hace 5 años martes, jueves, viernes, sábado y domingo, su clientela aumenta dien a dia, necesita otro crédito para la compra de ropa tipica, y así ayudar a su esposo con la economía familiar,de su hogar
texts.en: Josefa, 29, is married with two children. Her husband works  independently selling vegetables in the CENMA market in the capital of Guatemala. One of the children is in school.  Josefa sells traditional clothing such as cuts, huipiles (colorful dresses in Mayan style),blouses, etc. In front of the municipal market in her community, for 5 years she has been selling only on market days:Tuesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday.  Her clientele increases daily, so she needs another loan to purchase traditional clothing.  This will help her husband with the family finances and their home.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothing.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es: La señora Roxana es empleada en una fábrica de ropa y su esposo es chofer de servicio publico. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de material de construcción (arena, cemento, fierro, ladrillos) ya que realizara la construcción de una habitación nueva en su casa. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona  de Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz; es Casada y tiene dos hijos. Esta es la segunda vez que solicita un crédito a través de Kiva. Su historial de pagos es excelente y es cliente de IMPRO desde el año 2006.
texts.en:
Sra. Roxana is an employee at a clothing factory and her husband is a public transportation driver. The loan she is requesting will be used to purchase building materials (sand, cement, iron, and bricks) to complete the construction of a new room in their house. They own their home in the District of Pasankeri in the city of La Paz. Roxana is married and has two children.

This is the second time she has requested a loan through Kiva. Her payment history is excellent and she has been a client of IMPRO since 2006.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, iron, and bricks for building a room.

loans.name: Jesca

texts.en: Jesca is 25 years old, married, and has three children, two of whom are attending school. She is a businesswoman. She sells shakes, sugar, beans, etc. She took loan through BRAC South Sudan to buy sugar and beans with the hopes of expanding her business. She wants to buy goats and chickens to develop her family income.

loans.use: to purchase more sugar and beans to sale.

loans.name: Florinda

texts.es: Doña Florinda D. 27 años casada y tiene un hijo su esposo trabaja como albañil D. obras independiente, doña Florinda venD. frijol desD. hace cuatro años en el mercado municipal D. su comunidad, sus ventas han incrementado últimamente por su buena atención y precios cómodos, venD. un quintal D. frijol al día el fin D. semana y días D. mercado venD. más D. lo normal, ahora necesita otro crédito para poder comprar productos comestibles y lograr tener mayor ganancias y ayudar con los gastos D. su hogar,a su esposo.
texts.en:
27-year old Sra. Florinda is married and has a son. Her husband works as an independent construction worker. Florinda has sold beans for four years in the local municipal market. Sales have increased recently because of the good service and prices she offers. She sells a quintal (100 lbs/ 46 kg) of beans a day at the weekends and on market days she sells more than normal.

Currently she needs another loan to buy food items so that she will earn more money and help her husband with household expenses.

loans.use: to buy food items

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: El señor Mario es rentista jubilado; su esposa se dedica a venta de ropa y no tiene un puesto fijo, sino que es ambulante. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de material de construcción (ladrillo, cemento y arena) ya que construirá un muro en su casa para tener más privacidad y más seguridad. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona San Martín de la ciudad de La Paz; es casado y tiene seis hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente tiene un crédito en IMPRO y con Kiva; el análisis de ingresos y gastos  indica que es factible otorgarle un crédito.
texts.en:
Sra. Mario is a retired pensioner. His wife sells clothing as a traveling merchant since she does not have an established location. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy construction materials (bricks, cement, and sand) so that he can build a wall in his house that will provide more privacy and security. Mario lives in his own home in the San Martín District of the city of La Paz. He is married and has six children.

This is the first time Mario has received a loan from IMPRO and Kiva. The analysis of his income and expenses indicates that it is possible to provide him with a loan.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, cement, and sand for building a wall in his house.

loans.name: Juana Epifania

texts.es: Juana se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Tiene más de 38 años en su negocio. Su negocio dio inicio porque no tenía la oportunidad de proporcionarle a su familia ingresos diariamente, fue con muy poco capital que logro empezar este medio de vida. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de ropa en general, calzado, perfumes, lápiz labial y más productos. En un futuro quiere mejorar su actividad y ampliar su negocio cada día más.
texts.en:
Juana sells general merchandise and has been in this business for more than 38 years. She started her business because she was never given the opportunity to provide for her family’s daily income. With very little capital, Juana was able to start earning a livelihood.

The reason for this loan is to buy clothes, shoes, perfumes, lipsticks, and other products. In the future, she wants to improve and expand her business each day.

loans.use: to purchase clothes, shoes, perfumes, lipsticks, and other products.

loans.name: Bacilisa

texts.en:
Bacilisa, 46, is married with three children. She is the owner of a small grocery store that sells a variety of products. In her store, she also sells pizzas that she makes herself at home. In addition to her grocery store, she also has a small farm in which she produces vegetables. She sells the vegetables in the Urubamba market and also distributes them to various clients in Cusco.

Bacilisa is asking for a $500 loan in order to expand the merchandise she sells in her grocery store. She is a very hard working woman and is fully committed to making all the necessary payments on time.

loans.use: to add more merchandise to her grocery store.

loans.name: Ykua Vera Group

texts.es:
La formación de este comité fue gracias a la señora Antolina de Ciudad del Este. Ella contactó con sus vecinas y amigas para formar el comité en la zona.
El comité se denomina Ykua Vera, están en el Noveno Ciclo con 14 integrantes. Es un grupo muy unido, solidario y responsable, las integrantes poseen un gran espíritu emprendedor.
La Sra. Ramona se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, con lo cual puede mantener a toda su familia. Ella ha conseguido salir adelante por medio de este trabajo que ella considera muy digno. Lucha de forma incansable para poder tener un mejor porvenir.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de mas cosméticos, con lo cual podrá adquirir mayor variedad. Esta segura que obteniendo mayor variedad podrá conseguir mas clientes.
texts.en:
The formation of this committee was a result of the work of Sra. Antolina, who is from Ciudad del Este. She contacted her neighbors and friends so that they could start this local committee, which is named “Ykua Vera”. They are in their ninth loan cycle with 14 members. The group is very close, supportive, and responsible. All of the members possess a great entrepreneurial spirit.

Sra. Ramona sells cosmetics so that she can support her entire family. She is able to stay ahead as a result of her work, which she considers to be very dignified. Ramona strives tirelessly to have a better future. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy more cosmetics so that she can have greater variety. By having a better variety, Ramona is confident that she can attract more customers.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Braulio

texts.es: El señor Braulio es chofer y trabaja con su taxi en el área de transporte público de pasajeros. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de material de construcción (estuco, pintura, arena) ya que realizara la refacción de una habitación. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona Central de la ciudad de La Paz; es casado y tiene cuatro hijos. Esta es la segunda vez que su crédito es canalizado a través de Kiva, debido al excelente historial de pagos.
texts.en: Braulio is a driver who provides a passenger transport service with his taxi.  He needs this loan to buy building supplies (plaster, paint and sand) as he would like to refurbish a room in his home.  He lives in his own home which is located in the central district of the city of La Paz.  He is married and has four children.  This is the second time that his loan has been funded via Kiva owing to his excellent payment record.

loans.use: to buy plaster, paint, sand, etc. to refurbish a room in his home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more goods for resale.

loans.name: Donne Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama "Donne" ubicado en el estado D. México. Esta conformado por 11 integrantes entre ellas se encuentra la señora Maria D. 38 años D. edad, ella es madre soltera tiene dos hijos uno 12 y otro D. 1 año D. edad; la señora nos platica que lleva un poco mas D. un año trabajando en su tienda D. abarrotes, inicio porque ya no le alcanzaba el dinero para los gastos D. su familia; inicio el negocio con muy poca mercancia y muchas iluciones pero poco a poco comenzo a tener mas clientes y ahora tiene que invertir en mayor mercancia para abastecer la demanda D. sus clientes, su deseo es establecer y mejorar su negocio. Con el prestamo que obtenga lo invertirá para comprar refrescos, enlatados, articulos para el hogar. La señora Maria le pone mucho empeño en su trabajo, ya que su mayor motivacion son sus hijos y su familia siempre la ha apoyado desea brindarle a sus hijos una carrera para que tengan una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
The group is called “Donne” and is located in the State of México.  It has 11 members;  among them is María, 38.  She is a single mother of two children, a 12-year-old and a 1-year-old.  She tells us that she’s been working for a little more than a year in her grocery store.  She started it because she did not have enough money to cover family expenses.  She started the business with very little stock merchandise but with great hopes.  Gradually she started having more customers and now she has to invest in more merchandise to meet customer demand.  Her wish is to better establish her store.

She will use the loan she gets to buy soft drinks, canned goods and items for the home.  María puts a lot of effort into her work; her greatest motivators are her children.  Her family has always supported her efforts and she wants to proviD. her children with careers so that they’ll have better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, canned goods and items for the home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase charcoal and drinks at wholesale prices for resale.

loans.name: Lucrecia

texts.es: La señora Lucrecia vende ropa, artefactos electródomesticos, edredones y los fines de semana vende comida. Así ayuda a su esposo trayendo más ingresos para la familia. El crédito lo requiere para la aumentar capital comprar sabanas, y chamarras, pues con la temporada de frío estos artículos están siendo requeridos mucho. Lucrecia vive en anticrético en una casa, la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Alto Sopocachi en la ciudad de La Paz; es casada y tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito y por la calidad social del mismo es que se lo canaliza a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Lucrecia sells clothes, home appliances and comforters and on weekends she sells food.  This way she helps her husband by bringing more income for the family.  She needs the loan to increase capital buying sheets and jackets because with the cold season these articles are more in demand.  

Lucrecia lives in a house under the “anticrético” modality (Anticrético is a transaction not available in the U.S. whereby a property owner requests a "loan" from you in exchange for housing, which must be paid back to you at the end of your contract. If your loan is not repaid, the property owner loses the property to you) located in La Paz’s Alto Sopocachi zone.  She’s married and has two children.  This is the first time she’s asked for a loan and due to its social nature it’s being channeled through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy sheets and jackets to sell at retail.

loans.name: Marta Julia

texts.es:
MARTA JULIA

La señorita Marta Julia es soltera vive en Caserío Manzanal  se dedica a la  Crianza de Animales ( cerdos y pollos)   como también elabora tejidos ( Guipiles , servilletas, blusas y fajas típicas), inicio la crianza de animales hace 8 años con la ayuda de sus padres  que le dieron el capital para la compra un cerdo y luego con la ganancia de la venta del cerdo  ella  compro otro cerdo e invertir también en la compra de pollos   y asi venderlos, en el tiempo libre se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos  que inicio desde muy pequeña ya que su  mama   le enseño a tejer  ahora ella necesita un capital para poder invertir en la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos y la compra de pollos su deseo es poder  tener un poco mas de pollos , como también  quiere iniciar con la agricultura de follaje en su casa  y asi mismo para poder incrementar  sus negocios  su deseo es poder seguir ayudando a sus padres  para  salir adelante.
texts.en:
Señorita Marta Julia is single and lives in Caserío Manzanal. She earns her living by raising animals (pigs and chickens) and also by weaving (traditional blouses, napkins, blouses, and traditional belts). She began raising animals eight years ago with help from her parents who gave her the money to buy a pig and chickens to sell later. In her free time she weaves, something she’s been doing ever since she was a young girl. Her mother taught her to weave.

Now Marta needs money to buy supplies for her weaving and also some chickens. She would like to have a few more chickens and also to begin growing shrubs (greenery) at her house. In this way she will diversify her businesses. Her wish is to be able to continue helping her parents make headway in life.

loans.use: to buy weaving supplies

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es:
Matilde es una persona trabajadora y responsable que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Solidaridad de Tambo Real” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Matilde  nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad del Zurite (Anta, Cusco, Perú), tiene 43 años de edad y está casada y fruto de esta unión tiene cinco hijos. Actualmente, Matilde  vive en la comunidad de Tambo Real (Anta, Cusco) y donde tambien desarrolla sus actividades económicas. Matilde se dedica a la ganadería y también se dedica a la vende leche, ella pertenece a la Asociación Red de Productores Lácteos “Kuska Purisun” de la comunidad de Tambo Real. Ya son tres años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Matilde requiere el préstamo para comprar ganado mejorado o bien alimentado.
texts.en:
Matile is a hard-working and responsible person and because of this, her companions invited her to be part of the communal bank “Solidaridad de Tambo Real" of the Arariwa Association.

Matilde tells us that she was born in Zurite (Anta, Cusco, Peru) .  She 43, married and has five children with her husband.  Currently Matilde lives in the community of Tambo Real (Anta, Cusco) where she also works.  Matilde’s business is cattle raising and she also sells milk and she belongs to the Dairy  Producers Networking Association “Kuska Purisun” of the community of Tambo Real.  She has worked in this business for three years and it’s going very well, thanks to the effort she puts in.  At this time Matile needs a loan to buy better quality or better fed cows.

loans.use: To buy healthy cows

loans.name: Wabulenga Womens Group

texts.en:
Erinah, 37, has been running a used clothing sales business for the past five years in Jinja town. Her experience has taught her much about her client's tastes and preferences and also about the nature of doing business. This insight is something she has used to the advantage of her business. She, for example, knows that her female clients normally prefer long dresses during the cold seasons and her male clients fancy long sleeved shirts. She has learned to take in stride most of the many challenges that come with running a business.

Erinah is happily married with four kids who are all in school. She got the capital to set up this business from savings from her water and soft drinks sales business. Hard work, tenacity and determination are some of the attributes that Erinah has banked on to make inroads in her business. Monthly, this business generates sales profits totaling up to 150,000 Ugandan shillings.

With this Kiva loan, Erinah plans to purchase more bales of used clothing to resell.

loans.use: to purchase more bales of used clothing for resale.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es: El señor Miguel trabaja como  operador de máquinas en una empresa grafica de la ciudad de La Paz. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de material educativo (libros) ya que Miguel está estudiando la carrera de diseño grafico. Vive en casa de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Villa Fátima en la ciudad de La Paz; Miguel es soltero  y no tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que Miguel trabaja con nuestra institución y el análisis económico de su flujo de caja le permite ser sujeto de crédito.
texts.en: Miguel works as a machine operator in a graphics company in the city of La Paz.  He needs this loan to buy educational material (books) as he is studying for a degree in graphics design.  He lives in his parents' home in Villa Fátima district, in the city of La Paz.  Miguel is single and doesn't have any children.  This is the first time that he has worked with our institution and an analysis of his current finances show him to be eligible for a loan.

loans.use: to buy books and educational material so that he can continue with his graphic design studies

loans.name: Carlos Rafael

texts.es: Don Carlos de 36 años  trabaja como Auxiliar de enfermeria en el hospital Jacinto H. desde hace 5 años,  solicita su 1er credito para mejoramiento de una habitaciòn y asi gozar de mayor comodidad en el hogar , su esposa la ayuda con los gastos familiares ella es comerciante ambos son bien responsables segun referencia laborales, comerciales y personales, su mayor sueño en la vida es que sus hijos sean hombre de bien y que gozen de salud y no les haga falta lo basico en el hogar.
texts.en:
Don Carlos is 36 years old and has worked as a nursing assistant in the Jacinto H. hospital for five years. He is requesting his first loan to make improvements to a room in his house to make his home more comfortable. 

His wife helps with the family expenses. She is a merchant. Both of them are very responsible according to their work, business and personal references. His biggest dream in life is that his children will be good men, that they will enjoy good health and that they will not lack the basics at home.

loans.use: to improve the infrastructure of a room in his home.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El comité Mujeres Emprendedoras se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso. Todas las integrantes se definen como un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo. Lo principal del comité es la solidaridad y la cooperación.
La Señora Aurora es una de las integrantes del comité, ella tiene una pequeña despensa bien surtida, la cual es muy conocida en el barrio donde vive. Gracias a los años que tiene en este negocio, ella ya cuenta con una clientela bien formada. Ella sueña con algún día poder tener una despensa más grande donde pueda exhibir más variedad de productos a sus clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, hortalizas y demás para el abastecimiento 
de su local. Tiene las esperanzas puestas en el crédito, pues sabe que le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en: The Mujeres Emprendedoras group formed when various neighbors in the city of Mariano Roque Alonso got together. All of the members consider the group to be very united and are able to carry out their activities jointly to strengthen the partnership. The group's principles are solidarity and cooperation. One of the group's members is Aurora, who has a small but well-stocked convenience store that is very well-known in her neighborhood. Thanks to the years she has put into the business, Aurora has a well-formed customer base. She dreams that one day she will be able to make her store bigger so she can offer her customers a wider variety of products. She is requesting the loan to purchase food, drinks, vegetables and other items to stock her store.

loans.use: Compra de comestibles, bebidas, hortalizas para el abastecimiento del local.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more goods for resale.

loans.name: Yamilex Del Socorro

texts.es: Yamilex de 31 años de edad, labora como Responsable de Recursos Humanos desde hace 4 años desempeñandose con gran responsabilidad y honestidad,  solicita su 8vo credito con el que  pretende repellar una habitaciòn ya que en la temporada de lluvia  filtra el agua por la pared  y tiene que hacer esta mejora para evitar que esto siga, esta joven se ha caracterizado por ser bien responsable y muy trabajadora, su mayor sueño en la vida es tener estabilidad laboral para seguir mejorando su vivienda y que  a sus hijos no les haga falta lo basico en el hogar.
texts.en: Yamilex is 31 years old and has worked as a human resources manager for the past four years, performing her duties with the highest responsibility and integrity. She is requesting her eighth loan, which she intends to use to plaster a room in her home since during the rainy season water seeps through the wall and she has to make this improvement to prevent this from continuing. This young woman is known for being very hard working and responsible. Her biggest dream is to have job stability and to keep improving her home so that her children don't lack the basics.

loans.use: to plaster a room in her home.

loans.name: Custodio

texts.es: El señor Custodio se dedica a la producción leche, actividad que  también la realizan sus hijos y esposa. El crédito lo requiere para construir un establo para sus vacas lecheras y así resguardarlas del frío y las inclemencias del tiempo, pues viven en una zona altiplánica del departamento de La Paz. Vive en casa propia ubicado en la localidad de Achacachi  en el departamento de  La Paz; Custodio  es casado y tiene cinco hijos. Es la Primera vez que solicita un crédito en IMPRO; el volumen de sus ingresos y el análisis de su flujo de caja le permite la posibilidad de solicitar un préstamo.
texts.en: Custodio makes a living in milk production, an activity that his wife and children also do. He is requesting the loan to build a stable for his milk cows to protect them from the cold and inclement weather, since he lives in the high plains area in the department of La Paz, Bolivia. He lives in his own home in the town of Achacachi and is married and has five children. This is the first loan he has requested from Kiva partner IMPRO. His revenue volume and an analysis of his cash flow makes him eligible for the loan.

loans.use: to build a stable for his milk cows.

loans.name: Macaria

texts.en:
Macaria, 71, is married with seven children, six of whom are no longer dependent while one child still lives with her and her husband. She has a business selling charcoal and chicha, a local peruvian drink maD. from corn, at her home. After Macaria sells the charcoal from her store, she buys corn in order to make chicha to sell.

She was born in Urubamba and has been selling charcoal and chicha for 12 or 13 years. Macaria is asking for a $400 loan in order to buy more charcoal that she can sell at the store located in her house. She is committed to making all of her loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to sell at her store.

loans.name: Sonnie

texts.en:
Sonnie is 37 years old and lives in Paynesville.  She attended school and is a high school graduate. She is married and her husband is a teacher.  They have five children, all of whom go to school except for the youngest one who is only two years old.  

Sonnie sells dried goods including rice, oil, and salt, as well as water and soft drinks.  She is proud that her business is going well.  She started the business with money from her husband.

She’s requesting a loan to purchase more goods for resale. She would like enlarge her business and run her own shop.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for resale.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es: Miguel de 32 años de edad, solicita su primer credito para comprar un solar que le permitira en el futuro construir su propia vivienda y asi mejorar sus condiciones de vida y de su familia, su esposa trabaja el cual lo apoya con los gastos familiares,  segun referencias comerciales y  personales es un hombre bien responsable con sus compromisos adquiridos y bien querido por sus vecinos y comunidad, su mayor sueño en la vida es mejorar sus condiciones de vida y de su familia, tener un trabajo digno que no les falte lo basico en  el hogar.
texts.en: Miguel is 32 years old and is requesting his first loan to buy a plot of land that he can build his own home upon in the future. In this way he will improve the living conditions for he and his family. His wife works and helps with family expenses. According to professional and personal references, Miguel is a good man who honors his commitments and is well liked by his neighbors and in the community. His biggest dream is to improve his family's quality of life, to have a decent job and to not lack the basics at home.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land.

loans.name: Duo Jenesareth Group

texts.es:
DUO  GENEZARETH.
ESTA INTEGRADO POR LAS SIGUIENTES SOCIAS FLORIDALMA ELLA SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE TORTILLAS DESDE HACE TRES AÑOS, ELLA TIENE  A SUS HIJOS YA GRANDEA LOS QUE LA APOYAN EN SU NEGOCIO ELLA ES VIUDA Y NECESITA SU CREDITO PARA PODER COMPRAR MAIZ PARA LA ELAVORACION DE TORTILLAS Y  AMPLIAR SU NEGOCIO PORQUE  TIENE MAS CLIENTELA Y QUIERE PONER OTROS PRODUCTOS A LA VENTA. ROXANA SE DEDICA A LA VENTA  DE PRODUCTOS DE CONSUMO DIARIO ELLA QUIERE SURTIR MAS SU NEGOCIO PARA OBTENER MEJORES GANANCIAS Y PODER AYUDAR A SU FAMILIA.
texts.en:
Duo Genezareth is made up of the following members:
 Floridalma.  She has sold tortillas for the past three years.  Her children are already grown and they help her with her business.  She is a widow and needs the loan to buy corn to make tortillas and to grow her business.  She has many customers and she wants to also sell other products.

Roxana. sell food products every day. She wants to supply her business for more income so that she can help her family.

loans.use: To buy corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.es:
La señora ClotilD. tiene 46 años D. edad, está casada con el señor Pedro D. 47 años quien trabaja en la policia nacional, tienen 4 hijos D. 21,19,18 y 15 años D. edad, uno D. sus hijos es policia y una hija trabaja como empleada en una boutique, hace poco tiempo ambos la ayudan con los gastos familiares y los otros dos hijos estudian, todos ellos viven en la misma casa ubicada en la ciudad D. Itá.
La señora ClotilD. posee un salón D. belleza hace mas D. 8 años, allí realiza servicios D. corte, peinados, lavado D. cabeza, tintes, manicuro, pedicuro y todo tipo D. servicios D. peluquería a sus clientes. Gracias a los años que lleva en este negocio ha formado ya una gran clientela.
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra D. tintes, gel, agua oxigenada, shampoo, enjuage y otros productos que va a utilizar en la peluqueria.
texts.en: ClotilD. is 46 years old and married to Pedro, 47, who works for the national police. They have four children, ages 21, 19, 18 and 15. One of their sons is a policeman, and a daughter works at a boutique. Both have helped with family expenses for a little while, and the other two children are in school. They all live in the same house in the city of Itá, Paraguay. ClotilD. has had a beauty salon for more than eight years, providing haircuts, stylings, hair washing, dyeing, manicures, pedicures and other salon services to her customers. Thanks to the years she has put into the business she has a well-formed and large customer base. She is requesting the loan to purchase dyes, gels, peroxiD., shampoo, mouthwash and other products to use at her salon.

loans.use: to buy dyes, gels, peroxide, shampoo, mouthwash and other products.

loans.name: Leocadia

texts.es:
Leocadia nos cuenta que nació en la comunidad del Yungaqui (provincia de Anta, departamento Cusco, Perú), tiene 32 años de edad y tiene su pareja y juntos tienen dos hijos. Actualmente, Leocadia vive en la comunidad de Tambo Real (Anta, Cusco) y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas. Leocadia se dedica a la ganadería y también se dedica a la vende leche. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar ganado mejorado o ganado bien alimentado pues necesita cambiar de ganado para mejorar su productividad de leche.

Leocadia es una persona trabajadora y responsable que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Solidaridad de Tambo Real” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en: Leonarda tells us she was born in the community of Yungaqui (province of Anta, department of Cusco, Peru). She is 32 years old, married and has two children. Currently, Leonarda lives and works in the community of Tambo Real (Anta, Cusco). She makes a living in livestock and also sells milk. She has had this business for a number of years and it is going very well thanks to the hard work she puts into her job. At this time she is requesting the loan to purchase better or well-nourished livestock since she needs to make changes to her herd to improve its milk production. Leonarda is a hard-working and responsible person, which is why she was invited by the other members to join the "Solidaridad de Tambo Real" community bank with Kiva partner Asociación Arariwa.

loans.use: to purchase better livestock.

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
Annie is 42 years old and lives in Paynesville.  She attended school and is a high school graduate. She is married and her husband is a teacher.  They have three children between the ages of 4 and 19.  They all live at home and go to school.  

Annie sells cold drinks including water and sodas.  She is proud that her business is going well and likes to meet new people through her business.  She started the business with her own savings.

She’s requesting a loan to purchase more goods for sale including charcoal. She would like expand her business and support her children.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for sale including charcoal.

loans.name: Rosalio

texts.en:
Rosalio is 46 years old and single with one child. He has a small grocery store in Urubamba in which he sells all kinds of groceries. He also has a small farm at his house where he produces corn and vegetables. At times he travels to Cusco in order to sell the corn that he has grown on his farm. 

With his $1,000 loan, Rosalio plans to purchase all types of groceries so that he may expand his grocery store. He is hard working and committed to making all the necessary payments.

loans.use: to buy more products for his grocery store.

loans.name: Mayra

texts.en:
Mayra is 19 years old and single. She lives in the city of Ibarra, Ecuador, with her parents. Young, entrepreneurial, peaceful, and calm, Mayra has her own embroidery business. She creates hand-embroidered designs on t-shirts and other clothing. She is seeking this loan to purchase cloth and thread to complete her handiwork. 

Mayra has been embroidering as a business for two years. In the beginning, she had help from her mother. Now she works independently. Mayra’s goals for the future are to finish building her house and to finish her studies. In the photo, Mayra is proudly demonstrating her hand-embroidered design on a souvenir Ecuador t-shirt. Ibarra is located very close to a large market town very popular with travelers and locals alike.

loans.use: to buy cloth and thread for her embroidery business.

loans.name: A Florence

texts.fr: Florence est mariée et a à charge 3 enfants. Elle vit en location avec sa petite famille. Elle est aidée au foyer par son mari. Florence commercialise des chaussures de tout genre qu'elle étale aux abords de la voie dans l'enceinte du marché Tokpa, le marché international du Bénin. Elle fait ses ventes en gros et en détails aux usagers du marché. Florence fait ses approvisionnements au Togo, un pays frontalier au Bénin et les stock dans un magasin dans ledit marché. Elle est à son 7ème crédit à FINADEV et sollicite un renouvellement pour faire des approvisionnement. Une partie du revenu supplémentaire généré par cet appui financier sera réinvesti dans son commerce et l'autre lui permettra de faire face à ses charges personnelles et financières. Elle souhaiterait avoir d'autres variétés de chaussures afin de pouvoir faire face à la concurrence.
texts.en: Florence is married and has three children in her care. She rents a place to live with her small family. Her husband helps her in the household. Florence sells shoes of all types, which she displays near the road within the walls of the Tokpa market, the international market in Benin. She makes her sales in bulk and at retail to the market users. Florence gets her supplies in Togo, a country bordering Benin, and stocks them in a shop in the market. She is on her 7th loan with FINADEV and is seeking a renewal to obtain supplies. One portion of the additional income generated through this financial support will be reinvested in her business, and the remainder will allow her to provide for her personal and financial needs. She would like to have additional varieties of shoes in order to be competitive.

loans.use: To buy 35 dozen pairs of shoes of various kinds.

loans.name: Bienvenida

texts.es:
La Sra Bienvenida tiene 48 años, es Comerciante hace mas de 10 años, la misma se dedica a la venta de ropas usadas en su domicilio ubicada en la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, ella es madre de 4 hijos, la primera es Maria que tiene 20años y que esta trabajando en Argentina, el otro se llama Alejandro de 19 años que esta trabajando en un Lavadero del Barrio y las demás son  Andrea de 13 años y Cinthia de 15 años que le ayuda en el negocio de la casa.
También comenta la Sra que toda la familia se ayuda mutuamente para cubrir todos los gastos del colegio y demás gastos familiares.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de ropas de estación para la posterior venta. Esta muy esperanzada en el credito, ya que lo ve como una gran oportunidad.
texts.en:
Señora Bienvenida is 48 years old and has been a merchant for more than ten years. She makes a living selling used clothing from her home located in the city of Coronel Oviedo. 

She is the mother of four children. The first is Maria who is 20 years old and is working in Argentina. Another is named Alejandro who is 19 years old and works in a neighborhood laundry. The others are Andrea who is 13 years old and Cinthia who is 15 years old and helps her mother with the household business. She also mentioned that the whole family helps each other to cover all of the school costs and other family expenses. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase seasonal clothing for resale. She is very hopeful about this loan as she sees it as a great opportunity.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new vehicle

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es:
Rigoberto  nos cuenta que nació en la comunidad del Tambo Real (provincia de Anta, departamento Cusco, Perú), tiene 32 años de edad y tiene su pareja y junto con ella tiene seis hijos. Actualmente, Rigoberto  vive en la misma comunidad de donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas. Rigoberto trabaja en la municipalidad del distrito de Zurite en el área de construcción civil. Ya son varios años que trabaja como albañil y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Él y su esposa se dedican a la ganadería. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar ganado como por ejemplo vacas lecheras.

Rigoberto  es una persona trabajadora y responsable que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Solidaridad de Tambo Real” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en:
Rigoberto tells us that he was born in the community of Tambo Real (in the Anta province of the Cusco department, Peru). He is 32 years old and has a partner with whom he has 6 children. Currently Rigoberto lives in the same community where he was born and there he is developing his economic endeavors. 

Rigoberto works at the municipality of the Zurite district in civil construction. He has worked for several years now as a builder and he has done very well thanks to the effort he has put into his work. He and his wife also make their living in animal husbandry. Given this opportunity they need this loan to buy livestock like dairy cows for example. 

Rigoberto is a hard worker and responsible which is why his friends invited him to participate in the “Solidaridad de Tambo Real” comunal bank of the Asociación Arariwa.

loans.use: to buy livestock like dairy cows for example.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA GENERACION III”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 30 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de desayunos en forma ambulatoria, ella vende quinua con leche, manzana con leche, desayuno de maca,tortas,chocolate y sándwich de queso, ella trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 12:00 p.m en forma ambulatoria, también la socia hace tejidos de pantalones y chompas para bebes y los vende en forma ambulatoria, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de desayunos y venta de tejidos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para hacer desayunos y comprar lana para tejer los pantalones y chompas.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Nueva Generacion III” (New Generation III) Communal Bank, located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is 30 years old, lives with her common law partner, and has 3 children. She sells breakfasts on the streets every day – quinoa with milk, apple with milk, 'maca' (a local ground meal) breakfast, omelets, chocolate, and cheese sandwiches. She works from 5:00 am until 12:00 pm in the streets. She also knits pants and sweaters for babies and sells them on the streets.

She wishes to expand her business of selling breakfasts and clothing. She is soliciting a loan to buy breakfast supplies and wool to make pants and sweaters.

She is happy with the prospect of a loan and promises to comply with the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make breakfasts to sell, and buy wool to knit pants and sweaters to sell.

loans.name: Duo Luz Del Sol Group

texts.es:
G.S. LUZ DEL SOL.
ESTA INTEGRADO POR LA SIGUIENTE SOCIA ESTELA ELLA SE DEDICAN A LA VENTA DE ROPA TIPICA ES LA LIDER DEL GRUPO DOÑA ESTELA TIENE SU NEGOCIO DE AMBULANTE ELLA VENDE SU PRODUCTO DE CASA EN CASA Y AHORA QUIERE  PONER UN SU PEQUEÑO LOCAL Y PODER SURTIR SU MERCADERIA , NECESITA QUE SUS HIJOS ESTUDIEN PARA QUE SE SUPEREN,ELLA ESTA SOLICITANDO ESTE CREDITO PARA LA COMPRA DE MATERIA PRIMA  

ANA SE DEDICA TAMBIEN A LA VENTA DE ROPA TIPICA ELLA VENDE SU PRODUCTO TAMBIEN DE CASA EN CASA ELLA DICE QUE SU SUEÑO ES QUE PUEDA OBTENER UN SU LOCAL EN EL MERCADO PARA AGRANDAR SU NEGOCIO Y PODER TENER MEJORES GANANCIAS.
texts.en:
Estela is a member of G.S. LUZ DEL SOL, women who work selling traditional clothing. Estela is the leader of the group - she has a travelling business selling her products door-to-door and now would like to open a small store so she can increase her stock. She needs her children to study so that they can better their situations. She is asking for this loan to buy basic materials. 

Ana L. also works selling traditional clothing door-to-door. She says that her dream is to be able to open a small store in the market to expand her business and increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy basic materials for making typical clothing.

loans.name: Filomena

texts.es:
Filomena nos cuenta que nació en la comunidad del Tambo Real (provincia de Anta, departamento Cusco, Perú), tiene 35 años de edad y está casada y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos. Actualmente, Filomena vive en la misma comunidad donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas. Filomena tiene varias actividades como por ejemplo ganadería, agricultura y a la venta de leche. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar ganado como por ejemplo crías de toros.

Filomena es una persona trabajadora y responsable que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Solidaridad de Tambo Real” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en:
A native of Tambo Real (a community located in the Anta province, Cusco department), Filomena is 35 years old, she is married and has three children. Filomena currently lives in the same community where she was born, and here she engages in her economy activities. Filomena engages in different economic activities, such as livestock farming, agriculture and milk sale. She has been engaging in these activities for various years now, and things are going very well thanks to the determination she works with. The loan she is requesting in this occasion will be used to buy livestock such as calves.
Filomena is a responsible and hardworking woman, and thanks to these qualities she has been invited to join “Solidaridad de Tambo Real” (Tambo Real Solidarity), a communal bank of Asociación Arariwa, by its fellow members.

loans.use: To buy livestock such as calves.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 30 years old and lives with her partner. She has two children and was born in Quillabamba. Judith has her own tailoring business which is located in her home. She studied the art of tailoring for three years in a private institution called, "Arco Iris." She has had her business in her home for one year. 

With the $600 loan Judith plans to purchase fabric, thread, and other materials that she needs for her business. Her dream is to expand her tailoring shop and to concentrate on making dresses and other clothes. Judith is a very ambitious woman and is committed to making all the necessary payments on time.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA GENERACION III”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia  tiene 54 años de edad y es casada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, ella prepara desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, ella preparar platos como sopas, estofado de pollo, pollo al horno entre otros platos, la socia trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carne, pollo y verduras.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This member belongs to the "Nueva Generacion III" community bank in the district of Cusco, Peru. She is 54 years old, married and has a son. She splits her time between her household responsibilities and her restaurant, where she prepares breakfast, lunch and dinner. She makes items such as soups, chicken dishes and other meals. She works from 9 a.m. until 8 p.m. and in this way makes headway for her family. She wants to expand her restaurant and is requesting a loan to purchase ingredients like meat, chicken and vegetables. She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as meat, chicken and vegetables.

loans.name: Manantial Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MANANTIAL” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Collpani, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Juana. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: compra y venta de enaguas, tejido de mantas, elaboración de cereales, tejido de enaguas y polainas, tienda de barrio
 
La señora Juana,  indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer  y que ingreso por invitación de una promotora que visito su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de enaguas y chompas que viene trabajando hace treinta y seis años atrás, aprendiendo el mismo de sus amigas.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de lana), este material lo compra de la calle la Ceja (lugar comercial de la ciudad de El Alto), posteriormente elaborado sus productos los venderá en el Desaguadero. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella vive en unión libre y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando le preguntamos que le gusta de Pro Mujer ella respondio que la capacitación y la atención medica
texts.en: The "Manantial" group is starting its first loan cycle with Kiva partner Pro Mujer and is from the community of Collpani. The group consists of eight members and is headed by Juana. The members have various businesses, including: buying and selling skirts, weaving blankets, harvesting grains, weaving skirts and garters, and running a neighborhood store. Juana says this is her first time working with Pro Mujer and that she was invited to join by a promoter who visited her home. She has had a business selling wool skirts and sweaters for 36 years, learning the trade from her friends. She plans to use the loan to increase her capital and buy more wool, which she purchases on La Ceja street, the commercial center of the city of El Alto. She will then make the products to sell. This job allows her to generate income to support her family, since she lives with her partner and has four children. When we asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied the training and the health care.

loans.use: to purchase wool.

loans.name: Jenny

texts.en:
Jenny is 28 years old and lives near the city of Latacunga, Ecuador. She is married and lives with her husband and their three children. Their children are aged ten, nine, and seven years. Jenny is a cheerful and friendly person who gets along with all of her neighbors. She is always trying to learn more. 

Jenny works selling candy. She began her business when her oldest son turned four years old. She works with her mother and concentrates on selling candy near schools. Right now her business is slower than usual because students are no longer in classes due to summer vacations. 

She is seeking a loan to grow her business and increase her income by expanding her selection. She believes that this loan will help improve her standard of living through the growth of her business.  Jenny’s dream is to return to school in the future with the profits she makes selling candy, and to study computers to obtain a professional job.

loans.use: to expand her selection of candy for sale.

loans.name: Remberto

texts.es: El señor Remberto trabaja de chofer y su esposa se dedica a la venta de camisas de hombre. Con los ingresos que obtienen de ambas actividades se mantienen. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de una caja de cambios nueva para su movilidad, pues la actual está dándole muchos problemas. Remberto vive en casa de sus padres políticos (sus suegros) ubicada en la zona Villa Victoria de la ciudad de La Paz;  es casado y tiene tres hijos. Es primer crédito con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en: Remberto works as a driver and his wife sells men’s shirts.  Income they earn from both activities supports them.  He needs the loan to buy a gearbox for his vehicle because the one he has now is causing many problems.  Remberto lives in his in-law’s house located in the city of La Paz’s Villa Victoria zone.  He’s married and hast three children.  This is his first loan with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a gearbox.

loans.name: Topi Group

texts.en:
Veronica, who is in her mid 40s, is single with one grownup child.  She has been running a fruits and vegetable business since 1986.  She works from 6am to 11am daily (5 hours only) and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be her 1st loan from Tujijenge Tanzania which she wants to use for buying more fruits and vegetables. Her dream is one day to open a restaurant.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Topi" which has a total of 17 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: To buy more fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock for the business.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es:
La Señora Claudia, es casada, vive en la ciudad D. Villarrica, tiene 3 hijos.
Hace poco más D. tres años con la ayuda D. su cónyuge logro abrir una pequeña despensa en su domicilio, que con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación logro ir mejorando, gracias a que cada día tiene más clientes, con este negocio ella pueD. ayudar a su cónyuge a poder hacer estudiar y alimentar a sus hijos.
Ella manifiesta que su negocio le ha sido D. mucha ayuda y le gustaría poder seguir con el. Sueña con algún día poder ampliar su pequeño negocio y así poder ofrecer mas variedad D. productos a sus clientes.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra D. comestibles, bebidas, hortalizas, lácteos y demás para abastecer el stock D. mercaderías D. su negocio. DesD. ya agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que le esta brindando.
texts.en:
Claudia is married and lives in the city of Villarrica; she has three children.  A little over three years ago with help from her spouse she managed to open a small store in her home.  With much effort and dedication she’s been improving it thanks to her having more customers each day.  She can help her spouse educate and feed their children with this business.

She states that the store has been of much use to her and she’d like to be able to continue with it.  She dreams with some day being able to expand the small store and offer a greater variety of products to her customers.

She is asking for the loan to buy foodstuffs, beverages, vegetables, dairy products and others to stock her store with merchandise.  And as of now she thanks the Fundación for the opportunity it’s giving her.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Mkaratusi Group

texts.en:
Ramadhani, who is in his early 40s, is married with five children who go to school. He has had a food vending business for 2 years now.  He works from 4am to 6pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit. 

This will be his 3rd Motisha loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  A Motisha loan is a product offered by Tujijenge Tanzania that allows borrowers with good credit ratings to pay back their original loans faster and receive extra money before their original loan term has ended.  He used the previous loans to start selling chips and to pay school fees and household expenses, and he has paid back all his loans successfully.  He hopes for a loan to buy more food stock for the food cafe. His dream is to be able to build his own house one day.

He will share this loan with his loan group "Mkaratusi" which has a total of 10 members, and who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: To buy more food stock for the food cafe.

loans.name: Duo Ana Group

texts.es: Duo Ana: Este Grupo Esta Formado por Santos Timotea de 44 años soltera ella es la lider de este duo ella nos cuenta que se dedica a la confeccion de tejidos de ropa tipica ella nos cuenta que gracias a eso se a podido sostener ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos la otra socia se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles y esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles y tener y tener un mejor futuro.
texts.en: Ana's Group (Duo Ana): Santos Timotea, who is 44 and single, is the leader of this group.  She tells us that she weaves fabrics for traditional clothing, and that thanks to that, she has been able to support herself. She is requesting this loan in order to buy the raw material for weaving fabrics. The other member sells food products and is requesting this loan in order to buy food products and to have a better future.

loans.use: To buy raw material for weaving fabrics.

loans.name: Apolinar

texts.es: El señor Apolinar trabaja como empleado en una empresa y tiene un puesto de zapatería donde arregla calzados de damas, varones y niños. Así complementa sus ingresos. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de material de zapatería (goma, tacos, cola, clavos). Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Alto Tacagua en la ciudad de La Paz; es casado y tiene 5 hijos. Apolinar es cliente de IMPRO desde el año 2010 y su historial de pagos es excelente. Esta es la segunda vez que su crédito es canalizado a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Apolinar is employed at a firm and also has a shoe repair shop where he repairs women’s, men’s and children’s shoes.  He earns extra money this way.  He needs the loan to buy shoemaking supplies (glue, heels, rubber, nails).  

He lives in his own house located in the city of La Paz’s Alto Tacagua zone.  He’s married and has five children.  

Apolinar has been an IMPRO client since the year 2010 and his payment history is excellent.  This is the second time his loan has been channeled through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy shoe repair supplies.

loans.name: Tegemeo Group

texts.en:
Saleh, who is in his mid-30s, is married with 4 children who are still going to school.  He has been selling bread for 8 years now.  He works from 8am to 6pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be his second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loan to sell different types of bread, and he has paid back his loan successfully.  He hopes for a loan to buy a permanent place for his business (he is tired of renting). His dream is to own a bakery one day. 

He will share this loan with his loan group "Tegemeo", which has a total of 17 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: To buy a permanent place for his business.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
Alejandrina nos cuenta que nació en la comunidad del Tambo Real (provincia de Anta, departamento Cusco, Perú), tiene 44 años de edad y está casada y fruto de esta unión tiene cinco hijos. Actualmente, Alejandrina vive en la comunidad de Santa Barbará y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas. Alejandrina se dedica a varias actividades como por ejemplo la agricultura y ganadería. Ya son varios años que se dedica a estos negocios y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella también se dedica la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y vende en la feria de Inquilapata a 15 minutos de donde vive la socia. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para construir más galpones y comprar cuyes reproductores. 

Alejandrina es una persona trabajadora y responsable que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Solidaridad de Tambo Real” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en:
Alejandrina tells us that she was born in the community of Tambo Real (Anta Province, Cusco Department, Perú).  She’s 44 years old, married and has five children.  Currently, Alejandrina lives in the community of Santa Bárbara and that’s where she carries out her economic activities.  Alejandrina is engaged in several activities, for example, farming and raising livestock.  She’s been in these lines of work for several years now and does very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  She also raises small farm animals like guinea pigs that she sells at the Inquilapata market that’s fifteen minutes from where she lives.  On this occasion she needs the loan to build more animal enclosures and to buy breeding guinea pigs.

Alejandrina is a very hard working, responsible person and because of those qualities her fellow members invited her to join Asociación Arariwa’s “Solidaridad de Tambo Real” (Tambo Real’s Solidarity) communal bank.

loans.use: to build more animal enclosures and to buy breeding guinea pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more food stock for the business

loans.name: Romel

texts.es: El señor Romel trabaja como  chofer de minibús de transporte de pasajeros en el sindicato San Cristóbal de la ciudad de La Paz. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de un motor, pues así mantendrá en buen estado su herramienta de trabajo. Vive en casa de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Vino Tino en la ciudad de La Paz; es casado y tiene un hijo. El cliente se encuentra muy satisfecho con el crédito anterior  que obtuvo también a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Romel works in the city of La Paz’s San Cristobal Transportation Syndicate as a minibus driver transporting passengers.  He needs the loan to buy a motor to keep his vehicle in good working order.  He lives in his parents’ house located in the city of La Paz’s Vino Tinto zone.  He’s married and has a son.  He is very satisfied with the previous loan that he also got through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a motor for his minibus.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA GENERACION III”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 30 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de tejidos, ella tiene maquinas de tejer, ella teje chompas y pantalones de lana para niños y bebes y después lo distribuye a las diferentes tiendas donde vende ropa para bebes y niños, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de tejidos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales como lana, hilos, cierres y botones para tejer las chompas y pantalones y también para el mantenimiento de las maquinas.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Nueva Generación III” (New Generation III) communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.

She is 30 years old and has a spouse and two children.  She alternates her daily chores with selling knitwear.  She has knitting machines and she knits sweaters and wool pants for children and infants that she then sells to various stores that sell clothes for infants and children.  She is able to support her children thanks to this business.  She wants to expand and improve the knitwear sales and is asking for the loan to buy materials like wool, thread, zippers and buttons to knit sweaters and pants and also to service her machines.

She is happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy supplies like wool, thread, zippers and buttons to knit sweaters and pants and also to service her machines.

loans.name: Yaquelin

texts.en:
Yaquelin is 27 years old and was born in Urubamba where she still currently lives.  She has one child and a partner whom she does not live with.  She has been a teacher for six years at a pre-school in Yucay and she works everyday there from 8 am to 2 pm. 

She also has a grocery store in her house that has been open for one year and Yaquelin wishes to expand it.  With the 1,000 dollar loan, Yaquelin plans on buying more products for her store such as rice, sugar, and oil.  With her increased success from the loan, her dream is to buy her own house because at the moment she lives with her father.

loans.use: to buy products for her grocery store

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Cecilia is 24 years old and lives in Kakata, a town to the north of Monrovia.  She is married and her husband is a businessman.  They have 1 child, age 6, who lives at home and goes to school.  She attended school herself reaching seventh grade.

She has a small business selling plastic dishes which she has run for 3 years.  The main obstacle to her business is looking after her child when she is sick.  She started the business with money from her husband.

Cecilia will use the loan to purchase more stock for the business and use the profits to help with school fees.  In the future, she hopes to buy some land and build her own house.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for the business

loans.name: Julienne

texts.fr: Mariée, Julienne a 2 enfants à charge, ils sont tous scolarisés. Elle vit dans une maison familiale avec son mari, un agent de la douane exerçant au Port Autonome de Cotonou. Julienne vend diverses variétés de céréales, des sacs de charbon, des condiments et autres. Parallèlement, elle dispose de deux réfrigérateurs pour la vente de la glace et de l'eau glacée. Elle a son fonds de commerce installé à son domicile. Ses clients sont constitués des ménages de sa zone commerciale et de ses environs. Elle fait ses achats presque tous les jours au marché Tokpa, le plus grand marché du Bénin. Julienne est à son 2ème crédit à FINADEV. Présentement, elle sollicite et obtient le renouvellement de ce micro crédit afin de mieux achalander son étalage en divers articles de qualités et en quantités suffisantes pour combler les attentes de ses clients qui ne cessent de s'agrandir au jour le jour. Le revenu supplémentaire généré par ce micro crédit lui permettra de faire face à ses charges personnelles et de contribuer à l'épanouissement de sa famille. Elle souhaiterait ouvrir plus tard son 2ème stand les environs.
texts.en: Julienne is married and has two children in her care, both of whom attend school. She lives in a family house with her husband, a customs agent working at the Autonomous Port of Cotonou. Julienne sells various kinds of cereals, bags of charcoal, condiments, and other items. At the same time, she also makes use to two refrigerators to sell ice and ice water. Her business is set up at her house. Her customers come from households in the commercial zone and the surroundings. She makes her purchases almost every day at the Tokpa market, the largest market in Benin. Julienne is on her second loan with FINADEV. Currently, she is seeking and has obtained a renewal of this micro-loan in order to better stock her display with various items of sufficient quality and quantity to fulfill her customers' orders, which are constantly increasing day to day. The additional income generated through this micro-loan will allow her to meet her household expenses and contribute to the flourishing of her family. In the future, she would like to open a second stand in the area.

loans.use: To supplement her capital in order to buy ten 100kg bags of maize and 50 bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA GENERACION III”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 46 años de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de molinera, el prepara harinas y cereales de trigo,cebada,maíz y moraya ,el vende las harinas al por mayor y ofrece a las diferentes tiendas que vende los cereales y también en forma independiente, el trabaja juntamente con su esposa ya que ella se ocupa a  realizar las cobranzas del negocio de venta de harina, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de cereales y harinas. El  socio solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su molinera y para comprar trigo, cebada y maíz.
                                                
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Nueva Generación III” (New Generation III) communal bank located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.

He is 46 years old, married and has three children.  He alternates his daily chores with a milling business.  He makes flour and cereals from wheat, barley, corn and dehydrated, freeze dried potato.  He sells the flour at wholesale to various stores that sell cereals and also independently.  He works alongside his wife since she does the bill collecting for the flour selling business.  He wants to expand the business of selling cereals and flour.  He is asking for the loan to service his mill and to buy wheat, barley and corn.

He is happy with the loan and commits to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to service his mill and also to buy wheat, barley and corn.

loans.name: Duo La Providencia Group

texts.es:
DUO LA PROVINCIA
Integrada por dos hermanas,  doña Irma,  quien desde  pequeña aprendió el oficio de tejer güipil y a la crianza de animales, ya casada  siguió con su oficio con lo que ella  poco a poco ha logrado ayudar al sustento de sus 3 hijos,ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos también la señora Blanca,  quien  también realiza el trabajo de tejido en güipil  desde hace ya 20 años y ahora cuenta con una pequeña tienda ubicada en su domicilio donde vende artículos de consumo diario desde hace 3 años,  lo cual la ha ayudado bastante, porque puede atender su negocio como también atender a sus hijos y esposo y estar satisfecha con el aporte a la familia.
 Las dos como madres y esposas quieren lo mejor para sus familias y eso es lo que las motiva a seguir trabajando diariamente para un futuro prospero para sus pequeños hijos a quienes  ven crecer día con día.
texts.en:
LA PROVINCIA DUO

This group is made up of two sisters.  Irma learned to weave güipil when she was little, as well as how to raise animals. When she married she continued  in the trade and little by little was able to support her 3 children. She is asking for this loan to buy the raw materials to make weavings. Then there is Blanca, who also has woven güipil for 20 years. She now has a small store located in her house where she has sold items of daily consumption for 3 years. This has helped her a lot because she can attend to her business as well as her children and husband and be satisfied with what she is contributing to her family.  

Both of them, as mothers and wives, want the best for their families and that is what has motivated them to keep working everyday for a prosperous future for their small children whom they see grow day to day.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make weavings.

loans.name: Rosas De Franz Tamayo Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ROSAS DE FRANZ TAMAYO” iniciará su tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Los Andes, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Cinda. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de comida, venta de condimentos, salón de belleza, chofer, tejido de chompas, venta de mantas, y tienda de barrio 

La señora Cinda,  indica que hace un año que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de su comadre. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de condimentos, que viene trabajando desde hace cinco años aprendiendo el mismo de su hermano. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de condimentos) que adquirirá comprará del Desaguadero y lo comercializará los días miércoles y viernes a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los ahorros
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Rosas de Franz Tamayo” (Roses of Franz Tamayo) is starting its third loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Los Andes Community Center. The group consists of nine members and is led by a Board of Directors headed by Sra. Cinda. The members of the Communal Bank engage in various business activities such as selling food, selling condiments, managing a beauty salon, working as a chauffeur, knitting sweaters, selling blankets, and managing a store.

Sra. Cinda says that she has worked with Pro Mujer for one year and joined the organization after being invited by the godmother of her child. She currently has a business selling condiments. Cinda started working five years ago and learned the business from her brother.

The loan she is currently taking out will increase her capital for buying condiments. She acquires her goods in Desaguadero and sells them on Wednesdays and Fridays by request. Through her work, Cinda is able to generate income to support her family. She is single and has one child.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Cinda said she enjoys the savings.

loans.use: to purchase condiments.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es:
Cirila nos cuenta que nació en la comunidad del Tambo Real (provincia de Anta, departamento Cusco, Perú), tiene 49 años de edad y está casada y fruto de esta unión tiene cinco hijos. Actualmente, Cirila vive en la misma comunidad donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas. Cirila se dedica a la venta de leche en su domicilio pues sus clientes vienen desde la ciudad del Cusco a comprar. Ya son 25 años que se dedica a estos negocios y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para construir su casa pues está a medio construir.
 
Cirila es una persona trabajadora y responsable que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Solidaridad de Tambo Real” de la Asociación Arariwa.
texts.en:
Cirila says she was born in the community of Tambo Real in Anta Province, Department of Cusco, Peru. She is 49 years old, married, and has five children. Cirila currently lives in the same community where she was born and has developed her business activities. She sells milk from her home to customers who come from the city of Cusco. Cirila has been in business for 25 years and has done very well as a result of the effort she puts into her work. She is taking this opportunity to request a loan so that she can build her house, which is halfway through the construction process.

Cirila is a hardworking and responsible person. As a result of these qualities, her fellow group members invited her to participate in the Communal Bank “Solidaridad de Tambo Real”, which is part of Asociación Arariwa.

loans.use: to purchase materials for finishing the construction of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA GENERACION III”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 33 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y también el socio trabaja en el área de seguridad en la región D. cusco y el negocio de tienda de abarrotes trabaja su esposa y juntos sacan adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y también quiere mejorar en su trabajo .El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como arroz,azúcar,aceite,fideos y golosinas para la tienda de abarrotes.
                                                
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member is part of the Communal Bank “Nueva Generación III” (New Generation III) which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.  

This member is 33 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has two children.  The member divides his time between his daily activities and managing his grocery store business.  He also works in security for the Cusco region, so his wife helps with attending to their grocery business.  Together they are able to help their children get ahead.  The member wants to expand and improve his grocery business, as well as improve in his job.  He is requesting a loan to buy products such as rice, sugar, oil, noodles, and candy for his grocery store.  

The member is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, oil, noodles, and candy.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock for the business

loans.name: Amparo

texts.es:
A sus 56 años de edad, Amparo se considera una mujer emprendedora que lucha desde hace varios años por lograr una mejor calidad de vida, diariamente trabaja vendiendo dulces, y minutos de celular en una caseta que pudo adecuar para crear su negocio, y aunque éste no le deja muy buenas ganancias se siente afortunada por tener un negocio con el cual ganarse la vida, y al cual dedicarse para sacarlo adelante.

Con la ilusión de ver crecer su negocio Amparo sueña con comprar una nevera donde almacenar su surtido e igualmente invertir un buen capital de trabajo para comprar surtido en gran cantidad con lo que podrá generar más utilidades y paso a paso ir volviendo su sueño de tener un mejor futuro realidad. Sin embargo Amparo hoy en día no cuenta con ese capital de inversión que le facilitará su progreso y le brindará la oportunidad de mejorar su situación económica
texts.en:
At 56 years of age, Amparo is considered to be an enterprising woman who has strived for several years to achieve a better quality of life. She works every day selling candy and mobile phone minutes from a booth that is equipped for operating her business. Even though she has not generated very good returns, she feels fortunate to have a business so that she can earn a living and try to get ahead.

With the hope of seeing her business grow, she plans to buy a refrigerator so that she can store her inventory. She will also invest a good amount of operating capital in the purchase of a large quantity of merchandise so that she can generate more profits and see her dream of having a better future materialize. At the moment, Amparo does not have the capital that will facilitate her progress and give her the opportunity to improve her financial situation.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator and inventory for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock for the business

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA GENERACION III”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 34 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de pollería, ella vende pollos a la brasa desde las 4:00 a.m hasta las 11:00 p.m, la socia también prepara almuerzos y platos de fondo como milanesas y sopas, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de pollería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para preparar los pollos como papas, condimentos y pollos.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member is part of the Communal Bank “Nueva Generación III” (New Generation III), which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 34 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has two children. The member divides her time between her daily activities and her chicken business. She sells roasted chickens from 4am until 11pm. The member also prepares lunches and hearty dishes such as breaded meats and soups. Through this business, she is able to help her children get ahead. The member wants to expand and improve her chicken business. She is requesting a loan to buy supplies for preparing her chicken dishes such as potatoes, condiments, and chickens.

The member is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to purchase potatoes, condiments, and chickens.

loans.name: Santa Ana Group

texts.es:
