Por otro lado, ella y su esposo trabajan en la apicultura, poseen una granja de abejas, donde extraen cada cierto tiempo miel para venderla, y esto sucede durante la temporada de primavera, que es cuando recaudan hasta 40 litro de miel  y en invierno  es escasa la producción hasta 15 litros. Asimismo cultiva cebada, trigo, maíz y papa de donde también las vende al por mayor al mercado de abastos de su zona. Disfruta de cada  actividad que realiza, porque es la forma de generarse ingresos, que considera que son las más estables, permitiéndole durante muchos años el sostén de su familia y por tanto, su deseo es mejorar su granja de abejas y aumentar su producción agrícola. Por medio de sus vecinos supo de MFP que la invitaron a formar un banco comunal que tiene solidez en la actualidad, son varias veces que ha trabajado en estos préstamos y siempre ha cumplido con sus cuotas. Para esta ocasión, el dinero que solicita, comprará sacos de abono orgánico y semillas de maíz.
texts.en: Catalina is 52.  She lives with her husband and children in their own house.  She has worked in the fields all her life; her parents taught her to do this work, which, over time, she has made into her principal source of income.  In addition, she and her husband keep bees.  They have a bee farm, where at certain times of year they extract honey to sell.   This occurs in the spring, when they collect nearly 40 liters of honey, and in the winter, when the production is a scant 15 liters or so.  They grow barley, wheat, corn, and potatoes, most of which they sell at the local market.  She enjoys what she does, since it is her way of generating a stable source of income, which for many years has helped her to sustain her family.  Naturally, she wants to improve her beehives and increase her agricultural production.  She learned about Kiva partner MFP through her neighbors, who invited her to form a community bank with them.  This bank is now functioning, and she has received loans from it several times and has always paid regularly.  This time around, she is asking for funding to buy organic fertilizer and corn seeds.

loans.use: to buy bags of fertilizer and corn seeds.

loans.name: Zeidine

texts.fr: Jeune homme de 22ans, Zeidine achète des tricots, chemise et Lacoste  au grand marché de Lomé. Il est célibataire et veut ce premier montant pour renforcer son activité afin de mieux préparer sa vie future maritale.
texts.en: Zeidine is a young man of 22, who buys sweaters, shirts, and t-shirts at the big market in Lomé.He is unmarried and requests this first loan to enhance his business in order to prepare for his future as a married man.

loans.use: purchase sweaters and shirts.

loans.name: Nuulu

texts.en:
Nuulu is 42 years old and lives in the town of Kibuli in the Kampala central region of Uganda. She is married and has six children. Four of her children are currently in school. For the past seven years, Nuulu has had a business of selling food (matooke, a meal made from green plantain) in the market.         

To help expand her business, Nuulu has requested a loan of 2,000,000 UGX from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase food for resale. With the help of the loan from BRAC, Nuulu hopes to generate greater profits and pay for her children's school fees.  

In the future, Nuulu hopes to get a bigger working place to ease her work.

loans.use: to purchase food for resale.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Víctor vive en la ciudad de Tambo Real donde un grupo de personas formaron el banco comunal “Solidaridad de Tambo Real”. 

Víctor es casado, tiene 44 años y tiene cinco hijos, él nos cuenta que es albañil y se dedica a construir casas, refaccionar casas y otras cosas más. El también se dedica a la ganadería tiene varias vacas y toros. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del establo.
texts.en:
Víctor lives in Tambo Real, where he is a member of the  “Solidaridad de Tambo Real” community bank. 

Victor is 44, married, and has five children.  He is a construction worker and builds and renovates houses, among other things.  He also raises livestock and has some cows and bulls.  He has been doing this for a number of years, and it has been going well, thanks to the effort he puts in his work.  He will use this loan to maintain his stables.

loans.use: to maintain his stables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase new clothes to sell

loans.name: Mayra

texts.en:
Mayra is 32 years old and lives near the city of Latacunga, Ecuador. She is single and lives with her three children age 13, 8 and 2. She is a cheerful person who works hard to support her children and move forward. 

She sells a local specialty food known as “cuero,” which is made from the skin of pork. The dish is fried in its own fat until it is crispy and is often served with beans and potatoes. 

Mayra began her business several years ago with the hopes that, through her own business, she could give her children an education and support them as a single mother. She is seeking this loan to invest in her business and be able to make more cuero to sell. 

Mayra hopes this loan will help her change her life as it will help her invest in her work and help her give a better life to her children. Mayra’s dream is to have a larger business in the future.

loans.use: to invest in her food production business by buying more supplies.

loans.name: Yawa Edem

texts.fr: Revendeuse de sacs, chaussures et pagnes, Yawa est célibataire et a 01 enfant. Elle s’approvisionne à Lomé et revend sur place. Elle sollicite ce premier crédit pour acheter 04 douzaines de chaussures, 05 pièces de pagnes. Elle veut assurer un avenir radieux à son enfant elle a 33ans.
texts.en: Yawa sells bags, shoes, and traditional dresses, she is single and has 1 child. She buys her stock at Lomé and resells on site. She requests this first loan to buy 4 dozen shoes and 5 dresses .She wants to provide her child with a radiant future. She is 33 years old.

loans.use: purchase bags,shoes and traditional dresses.

loans.name: Babatoundé

texts.fr: Agé de 35ans, Babatoundi est couturier de profession. Il confectionne les habits et revend à toutes personnes.  Ce prêt qu’il sollicite lui servira à acheter une machine à coudre et une machine de plinthe. Il a commencé en 2009. Père de 02 enfants, il a 35ans et sa femme est revendeuse.
texts.en: 35 years of age, Babatoundi is a tailor by profession. He sews clothing and offers it for sale to anyone. This loan will allow him to buy a sewing machine and a [ruffler]. He launched his business in 2009. The father of two, he is 35 years old. His wife is a vendor.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and attachments

loans.name: Bessik

texts.en:
Bessik is a 36-year-old farmer from the village of Meskheti in West Georgia. He lives with his wife, Tinatin, a 4-year-old daughter, his mother and his retired aunt. 

Bessik has 15 years experience in farming. Bessik’s family has a plot of the land where he grows cucumbers, greens and watermelons. He sells the harvested products on the local market. All the adult family members take part in seasonal work on the plot. 

Bessik also trades scrap iron. The total average income of the family is 1,000 GEL per month. 

Along with the plot of land, Bessik has a steel structure of a greenhouse. He needs to purchase glass and cellophane to cover the structure and make the greenhouse ready for the fall and winter seasons. He plans to sow greens in the greenhouse, which will be sold to wholesalers. 

Using the greenhouse productively will significantly increase the income of the family. Part of the increase in income will be reinvested in the farm and the other part will be used for house renovation.

loans.use: to purchase glass and cellophane for the greenhouse.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy materials for making 'comales'

loans.name: Goderdzi

texts.en:
Goderdzi comes from village Rokiti, West Georgia. He is 44 years old and lives with his wife Tamila and 4-year-old daughter, Ani. Goderdzi works in local shop as a worker producing doors and windows. Along with his main job, he is leading the agricultural business of the family. In particular, the family has a small pig farm with 1 pig. They sell piglets in the village. Goderdzi also owns small plot of land where maize is grown. Harvested corn is used on the farm for feeding the pig and piglets. Though Goderdzi and Tamila work hard, their income is still very low and the family is still regarded as living below the poverty line. For this reason, they get social assistance from the state. Total average monthly income of the family, including government’s assistance, is 570 GEL. 

Goderdzi requested credit for 2 purposes. He will purchase fertilizers for the plot in order to increase the amount and the quality of harvest. With the largest part of the credit, Goderdzi plans to expand an existing pigsty building. The expanded building will allow him to add one more pig to the farm. The income from piglet sales will be doubled. 

In the future, Goderdzi plans to use increased income for improving family living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for pigsty expansion and fertilizers for the plot of land

loans.name: Mujeres Al Poder Group

texts.es:
Este Comité se formó a través de las Sras. Maria y la Sra. Liz, quienes se habían acercado hasta la oficina de la Fundación Paraguaya para interiorizarse más del Programa de Mujeres Emprendedoras, las mismas invitaron a sus amigas y vecinas del Barrio y decidieron sumarse al trabajo grupal para salir adelante y así mejorar su estilo de vida, son 21 mujeres trabajadoras y humildes que deben ganarse el sustento todos los días.
La Sra. Liria se dedica a la venta de calzados desde hace ya un tiempo, ha logrado tener una gran cantidad de clientes que siempre compran de ella sus productos. Le gustaría algún día poder abrir una tienda donde vender sus calzados, ya que actualmente el espacio con que cuenta es muy reducido.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de más tipos de zapatos, ya que así podrá atraer a más clientes. Desde ya agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que le brinda, ya que sabe que le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
This committee was formed by Maria and Liz who approached Fundación Paraguaya's office to find out more about the Committee of Entrepreneurial Women program.  They invited their neighborhood friends and decided to start working as a group in order to get ahead and improve their lifestyle.  These are 21 hard-working and humble women who must earn a living every day.

Liria has been selling footwear for some time.  She has managed to gain a large number of customers who always buy their products from her.  Some day, Liria would like to be able to open a store where she will sell her shoes.

Liria is requesting this loan to buy more types of shoes since, in this way, she will be able to attract more customers.  She is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the opportunity they are giving her.

loans.use: Compra de calzados para la posterior venta

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a variety of new clothes

loans.name: Mujeres Capaces Ii Group

texts.es:
El comité denominado Mujeres Capaces II es de la ciudad de Encarnación, actualmente cuenta con 12 miembros. Todas ellas trabajan en un marco de cooperación, respeto y solidaridad. Se unieron con un fin común, que es la obtención de mayores ingresos para que cada una pueda de esa forma ayudar a su familia.
Manifiestan que están muy contentas dentro de su comité, ademas de eso les gustaría poder seguir con el apoyo de la Fundación, ya que les ha sido de mucha ayuda.
La Sra. Miguela tiene una despensa en su casa, por medio de esto ella puede solventar todos los gastos de su casa. Manifiesta que este negocio la ha ayudado a progresar y a obtener mayores ingresos. Le gustaría algún día poder aumentar su pequeño local para tener mas estantes donde exhibir sus productos.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de fideos, arroz, azúcar, carnes, lácteos y demás para abastecerse de mercaderías.
texts.en:
The 'Mujeres Capaces II' committee is located in the city of Encarnación.  It currently has 12 members.  All of these women work within a framework of cooperation, respect and solidarity.  They came together with a common goal which was to make more income so that they could help their families.

The group say that they are very happy in their committee.  They would like to be able to continue receiving the support of Fundación Paraguaya since it has been very helpful to them.

Miguela has a grocery store in her home and, through her store, she is able to cover all her household expenses.  She says that this business has helped her to make progress and make more income.  Some day she would like to be able to expand her small business  with more shelves on which to display her products.

Miguela is requesting this loan to buy noodles, rice, sugar, meat, dairy products, etc. to stock her business with merchandise.

loans.use: to buy dairy products, groceries, meat and other products to stock her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy traditional clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Mzia

texts.en:
Mzia comes from West Georgia, village Zeda Meskheti. She is 54 years old, married, and lives with her husband Temur and two adult sons (32 and 25 years old). The younger son is a sportsman. Mzia’s elder son has health problems and gets a pension from the government in the amount of 70 GEL per month. The only source of the income for the family is agriculture. In particular, they own a plot of land, where cucumbers and greens are grown. Harvested products are sold at a local market. Mzia’s family also has a small dairy farm with 3 cows. Mzia produces and sells approximately 50 kg of cheese per month in the local open market. 

Though Mzia and Temur work hard on their farm, their income is still not enough to make some savings for renovation of the house. Because of this reason, she requested the credit to start renovation work. The borrowed amount will be enough to renovate the bathroom. It will add comfort to family’s everyday life.

loans.use: to purchase materials for bathroom renovation and pay the workers

loans.name: Faustina

texts.es: La señora Faustina es una mujer muy trabajadora que con su esfuerzo y el D. su esposo logro sacar adelante a sus hijos y les dio una profesión, ahora ella dice que es tiempo D. realizar su sueño, que es tener una tienda D. ropa para las señoras D. polleras para lo cual necesita el préstamo, ella tiene la tienda y las herramientas necesarias pero quiere surtir la mercadería con telas para eso utilizara el dinero para la compra D. telas modernas y realizar confecciones que están mas a la moda, también lo que ella hace es alquilar estas prendas para fiestas  y su mercancía tiene que ser  novedosa y a la moda por lo que invertirá su crédito para realizar su sueño, es una persona muy dinámica y muy alegre agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Faustina is a very hard-working woman who, through her own efforts and those of her husband, managed to get her children ahead in life and give them a profession.  Now she says that it is time to achieve her dream which is to own a clothes store for 'señoras D. polleras' (ladies who wear 'polleras' - a traditional skirt).  For this reason, she needs a loan.  Faustina already has her store and the tools she needs but she would like to stock her store with fabrics.  She will use her money to buy modern fabrics and make skirts that are more fashionable.  She also hires out these garments for fiestas and her merchandise must be new, original and fashionable.  She will invest her loan in fulfilling her dream. 

Faustina is a very dynamic and cheerful person who is grateful to the institution for the support they have provided.

loans.use: to buy fabric to make 'polleras' (traditional skirts)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy palm oil, rice and textiles

loans.name: Gibril

texts.en:
This is 50-year-old Gibril. He is married and has 4 adult children. In 2007, he established his cinema and show football matches business. He began his business after retiring from his job. Gibril decided to do such a business and has realized quite a lot from this business. Working 7 days a week and 4 hours a day, he earns about 1,000,000 SLL every month from this business. 

He would like a loan in the amount of 4,500,000 SLL to buy chairs and benches, make repairs and extend his hall. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately 350,000 SLL. 

In the future, he plans to get another satellite dish and decoder with multiple channels and educate his children to university level. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy chairs and benches, and make repairs and extend his hall

loans.name: Narciso

texts.es:
El Sr. Narciso de 41 años de edad, esta acompañado con la Sra. Liliana, ellos tienen la dicha de tener 3 hijos que actualmente están cursando sus estudios primarios.
Don Narciso es mecánico, se dedica a este trabajo hace más de 12 años, aproximadamente desde el año 1.999; comenzó con el capital que su madre le dió por venta de un terreno. El cuenta con un pequeño taller donde repara los automóviles que le son llevados. El Sr. se defina como un hombre muy trabajador y luchador, todo lo que hace es por el bien de su familia.
El solicita el credito para la compra de llaves, gatos, pinzas y demás instrumentos que utilizara en el arreglo de los vehículos que le son llevados.
texts.en:
Mr. Narciso, age 41, lives with Mrs. Liliana. They are blessed with three children who are currently in elementary school.
Mr. Narciso is a mechanic. He has done this work for over 12 years, approximately since the year 1999. He started off with the capital that his mother gave him from the sale of a plot of land. He has a small workshop where he repairs the vehicles that are brought to him. He describes himself as a very hard-working man. Everything that he does is for his family's well-being.
He is requesting this loan for the purchase of keys, jacks, clips and other instruments that he will use to repair the vehicles that are brought to him.

loans.use: to purchase keys, jacks, clips and other instruments which he will use to repair vehicles.

loans.name: Mamuka

texts.en:
Mamuka is 40 years old and comes from village Dimi, West Georgia. Mamuka is unmarried and lives with his parents, who are retired. 

The family has a small dairy farm with 2 milk cows. Mamuka’s mother produces approximately 40 kg cheese per month. Mamuka sells it in the local open market. The family also has a vineyard with 500 vines. Mamuka sells the grapes in the local market as well. He also sells nuts harvested from 100 nut trees. The total average income of the family, including pensions of the parents, is 500 GEL per month. 

Mamuka requested credit for purchasing an additional milk cow. The family will be able to produce and sell 50% more cheese. Increased income will allow to Mamuka and his parents to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Diego De Jesus

texts.es:
A sus 30 años de edad Diego es reconocido por su voz, desde hace 12 se dedica a cantar, y generalmente lo hace como mariachi. Esta labor la heredó de su padre quien actualmente también canta y desde pequeño le ha apasionado la música y la interpretación de la misma, es por estoy que hoy en día utiliza su talento como método para generar ingresos.

Diego sueña con llegarle a mas clientes, y ser un cantante reconocido en su ciudad Medellín donde realiza su labor, pero para ellos es conciente que deberá seguir trabajando y conociendo nuevos clientes a quienes deleitar con su voz, pero actualmente carece de un amplificador de sonido que le facilite no solo el servicio si no que sus clientes lo escuchen con mas calidad y cobertura, pero Diego no cuenta con el capital para comprar esta herramienta de trabajo por  lo que solicita un crédito que le permita mejorar el servicio y proporcionalmente su calidad de vida
texts.en:
At the age of 30, Diego is recognized by his voice. For 12 years he has been a singer, mainly a mariachi singer. This work was passed down to him by his father, who is currently also a singer. He has had a passion for music and music interpretation from a young age, and this is why he is now using his talent to generate his income.

Diego dreams of having more clients, and being a well-known singer in his city, Medellin, where he works. But in order for this to happen, he knows that he has to keep working and meeting new clients to delight with his voice. At the moment he needs a sound amplifier, which will help him not only in providing his services, but also mean that his clients will hear him in greater quality and range. Diego does not have the capital to purchase this work tool, so he is requesting a loan which will allow him to improve his service and thus his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a sound amplifier

loans.name: Serenidad Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Serenidad, se conformó gracias a la Presidenta del grupo, quien logró juntar a 16 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el 9º ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa.
Todas ellas participan activamente en las reuniones semanales, se ayudan mutuamente para llegar a los objetivos en común que todas tienen dentro del grupo.
La Sra. Julia se dedica a la venta de bebidas, por medio de este trabajo ella ha podido salir adelante con su familia. Se siente muy orgullosa de lo que hace, ya que es un trabajo honesto y sacrificado.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de bebidas ya sea cerveza, gaseosas, energizantes y demás para la posterior venta.
texts.en:
This Women's Committee, called Serenidad ["Serenity"], was formed thanks to the group president, who managed to unite 16 women who have been working very well together and are now in their ninth loan cycle. They work together in the program.
All of them participate actively in the weekly meetings and help each other to achieve the common objectives that they all have for the group.
Mrs. Julia sells drinks. Through this work she has been able to get her family ahead. She is very proud of what she does, since it is an honest and selfless job.
She is requesting a loan for the purchase of drinks such as beer, pop, energy drinks and more for the next sale.

loans.use: to purchase drinks; energy drinks, pop and more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more used bags for her business.

loans.name: Merab

texts.en:
Merab is 52 years old. He comes from the village of Tsitelkhevi, West Georgia. 

Merab is married and lives with his wife, Mariam, their 19-year-old daughter and his 76-year-old mother. 

Merab trades in grocery products. He buys them in Kutaisi and takes them to the nearby villages with his car. The family also owns a 1-hectare plot where they grow watermelon. Also, the family has 250 nut trees on their plot. Merab sells harvested nuts and watermelons in his village and nearby. The total average income of the family is 800 GEL per month. 

Merab requested credit for purchasing fertilizers. After fertilizing the plot, he will get a better and higher-quality harvest, which will bring more income to the family. The family hopes that the increased income will be enough for house renovations. It was renovated a long time ago and needs some additional work to become quiet and comfortable.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more plastic bowls, wash boards, baskets and buckets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy food products.

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
This is a 46-year-old Fatmata. She is married and has four children age 20, 18, 16 and 4 years. 

In 1991, she established her flasks, dishes, bowls, buckets and kitchen utensils business. She began her business upon the advice of her husband that business would go a long way in solving her domestic problems and giving them a brighter future. 

Working seven days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about SLL 3,400,000 every month from this business. 

She would like a loan in the amount of SLL 5,000,000. She requires a loan in order to buy buckets and assorted plastic wares and to transport the goods. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately SLL 800,000. 

In the future, she plans to give the best education to her children, to have a house and to live a happy and healthy life during her old age. She is thanking you for your support.

loans.use: To buy flasks, dishes, bowls, buckets and kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Yeanor

texts.en: This is 45yrs- old Yeanor.  She is married, and has 2 children aged 21and 27yrs. She has no additional dependants.   In 1990, Yeanor established her business to buy school bags, suitcases,toys etc. She began her business because she realized  it will be very necessary to assist her husband. Working 6 days a week and 12 hours a day, she earns about Le 944,000 every month from this business as profit. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,500,000. Yeanor requires this amount in order to improve on her business by purchasing large stock of bags,toys and suitcase at a reasonable cost. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 200,000. In the future, Yeanor plans to have an apartment structure where she will live to enjoy her old age.   She is thanking you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more toys, school bags and a suitcase.

loans.name: Juan Blas

texts.es:
El Sr. Juan es de la ciudad de Santani, tiene 48 años de edad, esta casado con la Sra. Benita de 38 años de edad, Actualmente tienen 2 Hijos, ambos menores de edad.
El Cliente tiene una despensa, por medio del cual puede mantener los gastos de la casa. Se define a si mismo como una persona luchadora y trabajadora, ademas comenta que tener una despensa es muy sacrificado ya que tiene que trabajar de lunes a lunes.
Uno de sus sueños es algún día poder ampliar su negocio y poder tener un pequeño autoservice.
Solicita el credito para la compra de comestibles, lácteos, bebidas, hortalizas y demás, que servirán para mantener surtido su local. Tiene esperanza en el credito, ya que le sera de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Mr. Juan is from the city of Santini. He is 48 and married to Mrs. Benita, age 38. They currently have 2 children, both young.
He has a store that allows him to cover his household costs. He describes himself as a hard-working person, and also says that having a store is very difficult, since he has to work every day of the week.
One of his dreams is to be able to expand his business one day and have a small autoshop.
He is requesting this loan for the purchase of food items; dairy products, drinks, vegetables and more. This will allow him to maintain his stock. He has high hopes for this loan, as it will be a great help for him.

loans.use: to purchase food items; dairy products, drinks, vegetables and more.

loans.name: Mariama

texts.en:
Forty-five-year-old Mariama, a married mother of two children, established her clothing business in 1991 to improve her economic situation and to see her children through their education. Working 6 days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about Le 850,000 every month.

Mariama is requesting a loan for Le 5,000,000, Le1,000,000 of which she will use to buy local cotton, Le1,000,000 to buy Brillion and Le2,000,000 to buy wax cotton. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 400,000. In the future, Mariama plans to build a dwelling house and a bigger shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy local cotton, Brillion and wax cotton.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos es un joven emprendedor que a sus 28 años de edad se hace cargo de un negocio familiar que existe desde hace 2 años, un almacén que fue creado gracias a la investigación y estudio de mercado que su familia realizo después de que su anterior jefe montara un negocio familiar.

Carlos trabajaba como Diseñador Grafico en una empresa diseñando estampados pero con la ilusión de salir adelante, independizarse y generar una microempresa que fuera el sostenimiento de su familia decidió dejar su trabajo y emprender esta idea.

Actualmente Carlos trabaja de lunes a sábado sin descansó, con la motivación de ver su negocio prosperar día tras día. Y con esta misma lucha de mejorar paso a paso hoy en día necesita invertir capital para comprar mercancía de contado y al por mayor, con la intención de generar mas utilidades y no dejarse vencer de la competencia, pero él no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para dicha inversión y es esta razón lo que hoy lo impulsa a pedir un préstamo que le permita mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is a young entrepreneur who, at the age of 28, is in charge of a family business that has been around for two years: a store, which was created thanks to the research and market studies that his family conducted after his old boss opened a family business.

Carlos worked as a Graphic Designer for a company, designing patterns, but he had a desire to get ahead, become independent, and generate a microbusiness to sustain his family. He decided to leave his job and take on this idea.

Carlos currently works from Monday to Sunday without a break, and with the motivation to see his business prosper day to day. With this goal, to improve bit by bit, he now needs to invest capital to purchase wholesale merchandise in cash. This will generate him more profits and ensure that he is not beaten by the competition. However, he does not have the money for this investment. This is why he is now requesting a loan which will allow him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of stock.

loans.name: Duo Gavi Group

texts.es:
GAVI
doña blanca mas conocida como doña azucena la lider del duo ella se ha dedicado desD. hace cinco años cuando era soltera a la venta D. cosméticos ahora que es casada completo su negocio con venta D. ropa, para apoyar a su esposo en los gastos D. la casa por el tiempo que la vida nos presenta es necesario que los dos aporten para sacar adelante a sus hijos  nos comenta  su anhelo, es surtir mas su negocio ya que por el momento es pequeño,ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. cosmeticos  D. igual forma doña Florencia comenzó vendiendo frutas en el mercado local D. san Bartolo con el tiempo descubrió que el negocio D. ella era la panadería y comenzó el negocio con su esposo ahora que el ya no vive ella sigue con el negocio D. panadería para seguir apoyando a sus hijos ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. arina para elavorar pan.
texts.en:
GAVI

Blanca, better known as Azucena, is the leader of this group.  She has been selling cosmetics for five years, since she was single.  Now that she is married, she also started selling clothes in her business in order to support her husband with their household expenses.  As a result of what life is presenting us with right now, it is necessary that the two of them both contribute to their household so that they can get their children ahead in life.  Blanca tells us that her wish is to further stock her business as it is small right now.  She is requesting this loan to buy cosmetics.

Florencia started out selling fruit in the local market in San Bartolo.  Over time, she discovered that the right business for her was a bakery.  She started her business with her husband and, now that he is no longer alive, she continues in the bakery business so that she can support her children.  She is requesting this loan to buy flour for making bread.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics

loans.name: Ñañopytyvomba Group

texts.es:
El comité Ñañopytyvomba se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní. Todas las integrantes del comité trabajan activamente, en un ambiente de cooperación y respeto. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo.
La Sra. Dolores es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de sabanas, frazadas, fundas, edredones y demás, desde hace ya unos años. Todos los vecinos del barrio ya la conocen y gracias a eso ha podido hacerse de una gran clientela. Este trabajo la ha ayudado a salir adelante, ya que genera un poco mas de ingresos y esta pudiendo solventar todos los gastos de la casa.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de sabanas, edredones, colchas y demás, para poder aumentar la variedad de sus mercaderías.
texts.en:
The Ñañopytyvomba committee was formed by several neighbors from the town of Santaní.  All the members of the committee work actively, in an environment of cooperation and respect.  The members formed a very united group which is capable of jointly carrying out activities that strengthen their team spirit.

Dolores is a saleswoman who has been selling sheets, bedspreads, pillowcases, comforters, etc. for some years.  All her neighbors know her and, thanks to this fact, she has been able to form a good customer base.  This work has helped her to get ahead since she makes a little extra income and is able to cover all her household expenses.

Dolores is requesting a loan to buy sheets, comforters, bedspreads, etc. so that she can increase the variety of merchandise she sells.

loans.use: Compra de sabanas, edredones, colchas y demás.

loans.name: Génesis Group

texts.es:
El grupo Génesis lo conforman  la señora Juana del Rosario de 49 años, don José Armando de 48 años y don  Juan Manuel de 30 años. Ellos se dedican al comercio de Cortez de telas las cuales vende de manera ambulante.
 
La coordinadora del grupo es la señora Juana quien en 1987 inicio a comercializar de manera ambulante recortes de tela. El sueño de ella es tener una tienda de textiles e invertirá el crédito en la comprar de telas para el negocio.
texts.en:
The Génesis group is made up of Mrs Juana del Rosario, age 49, Mr. José Armando, age 48, and Mr. Juan Manuel, age 30. They are merchants of cuts of fabric which they sell in street markets.

The group coordinator is Mrs. Juana, who started selling cuts of fabric in street markets in 1987. Her dream is to have a textile store, and she will invest this loan in the purchase of fabrics for her business.

loans.use: to purchase fabric

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: Fernando es un hombre muy trabajador, que a sus 54  años  sigue trabajando por el bienestar de su familia, es casado y tiene un hijo que es su razón de ser. La actividad que realiza, es la agricultura y el trasporte, de esta manera se genera los ingresos económicos para sostener a su familia. Tiene10 años de trabajo continuo, sin embargo la agrícultura no le generaba los ingresos suficiente para vivir cómodamente, es así  que se dedica de lleno en el servicio de transporte, donde traslada a la gente de la zona rural de Jauja hasta Paccha. Pero su mayor anhelo es tener otro carro más para seguir brindando éste servicio. Son 3 veces que esta trabajando con MFP, en todo este tiempo ha demostrado ser puntual en sus pagos y ser una persona de palabra, pues se ha ganado la confianza de los demás integrantes de su grupo solidario. Con el crédito que solicita, lo utilizará en la compra de sacos de abono para fertilizar sus terrenos, asimismo en la llevar su vehículo al taller mecánico.
texts.en: Fernando is a very hard-working person who is still working for his family's well-being at the age of 54. He is married and has one child who is his reason for being. He works in agriculture and transport. This is how he generates an income to sustain his family. He has been working continuously for 10 years. However, agriculture has not generated him sufficient income to live comfortably, so he also provides a transportation service. He transports people from the rural zone of Jauja to Paccha. His greatest wish is to have another car in order to continue offering this service. He has worked with MFP three times, and in this time he has proven himself to be punctual in his payments, and to be a man of his words. He has gained the confidence of the other members of his solidarity group. With the loan that he is requesting, he will purchase bags of fertilizer to fertilize his lands, and bring his vehicle to the mechanic.

loans.use: to bring his vehicle to the mechanic and purchase bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Juan Benjamin

texts.es: El Sr. Juan de 40 años, con un  hijo y su esposa,  tiene ya  5 años dedicándose a la elaboración de zapatitos para niñas, realiza su trabajo en el domicilio de sus padres ya que actualmente se encuentra viviendo con ellos. El Sr.  Juan   se vio en la necesidad de solicitar crédito de nuestra institución debido al crecimiento apresurado de su negocio ya que incluso los clientes le piden que realice calzados para mujeres, es cliente nuevo  de la institución, con el dinero del  crédito compra de maquina de costura, cuerina, plantillas, cartón, etc. para la fabricación y confección de las zapatillas, es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Juan is 40 years old and has a wife and son.  He has been making little shoes for girls for five years.  He carries out his work in his parents' home as he is currently living with them.  Juan found himself needing to request a loan from our institution owing to the quick growth of his business as his customers are asking him to make women's footwear too.

Juan is a new member of our institution.  He will use his loan money to buy a sewing machine, leatherette, insoles, card, etc. for making his shoes.  He is a very hard-working person who is grateful to our institution for the support they have provided.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, leatherette, insoles and card

loans.name: Duo Divino Maestro Group

texts.es:
DUO  DIVINO MAESTRO
Es integrada por doña Hilda  madre de 4 hijos, quien se dedica a la   venta de comida, refacciones  y golosinas  desde hace 3 años, Y es la lider del duo es una mujer  trabajadora  quien le brinda sola el sustento de su familia, ya que su  esposo abandono  su hogar ya hace varios años, todos los días vende y reparte comida en el mercado local de su comunidad con la ayuda de su segundo hijo quien regresa de sus estudios y despues le ayuda a vender, ella necesita el credito para la copra de productos comestibles para la elavoracion de refacciones para seguir con y no quedarle mal a sus clientes, como toda madre quiere lo mejor para sus hijos, su sueño es darles un mejor futuro a sus hijos 
Doña Josefina,  quien  vende actualmente toda clase de zapatos juntamente con su esposo iniciaron este negocio hace 6 años, la mayoría de sus productos  son elaborados por su esposo y varios empleados que tienen en su hogar, ha visto crecer su negocio poco a poco, ella atiende su local todos los días y así mismo puede dedicarle el tiempo a sus 2 pequeños hijos, necesita de capital por que la demanda que sus clientes piden en nuevos diseños. Es una joven mujer con muchas ganas de seguir ayudando a su  esposo  y mantenerse en el mercado.
texts.en:
'Divino Maestro' Group.

This group has two members.  Hilda is the mother of four children.  She has been selling food, snacks and candies for three years.  She is the leader of this group.  Hilda is a hard-working woman who is solely responsible for supporting her family as her husband left home several years ago.  Every day she sells food in the local market in her community with the help of her second son who comes home from school and then helps her to make her sales.  She needs this loan to buy food products for making snacks so that she can continue working and not let down her customers.  In common with all mothers, she wants the best for her children.  Her dream is to provide them with a better future.

Josefina and her husband currently sell all kinds of shoes.  They started their business six years ago.  Most of the products are made by Josefina's husband and several employees who work in their home.  She has seen her business grow gradually.  Josefina serves in her business every day and, at the same time, she is able to spend time with her two young children.  She needs capital because her customers keep requesting new designs.  Josefina is a young woman who has a great desire to continue helping her husband and stay in the market.

loans.use: to buy food products for making snacks

loans.name: Mujeres Victoriosas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres Victoriosas lo conforman tres féminas trabajadoras ellas son Ana, Concepción y Guadalupe. La coordinadora del grupo es la señora Ana de 55 años quien hace 20 años invirtió sus ahorros en una paca de ropa. En la actualidad ella comercializa tres pacas de ropa y calzado con la ayuda de su hija y compañero de vida. 
El sueño de ella es prosperar, aumentar su negocio y crecer. Ella invertirá el crédito en la compra de mercadería.
La señora Concepción vende ropa de manera ambulante en mateare y en su casa tiene una pequeña venta de frijoles cocidos, chocobananos, frescos, helados y repostería; y Guadalupe tiene una venta donde comercializa gaseosas, refresco…etc. además vende prendas desde hace 18 años.
texts.en:
The “Mujeres Victoriosas” (Victorious Women) Communal Bank is comprised of three hard-working women; Ana, Concepción, and Guadalupe.

Ana, age 55, is the group coordinator.  Twenty years ago she invested her savings in a bundle of clothes.  She currently sells three bundles of clothes and footwear.  Her daughter and her life partner help her.  Her dream is to prosper, to add to her business, and to grow.  She will use the loan to buy merchandise.

Concepción sells clothes in an itinerant manner in Mateare.  She also has a small business selling cooked beans, “choco bananas” (chocolate covered bananas), cold drinks, ice cream, and pastries.

Guadalupe sells soft drinks and refreshments, etc.  She has also been selling clothing for 18 years.

loans.use: to buy bundles of clothing.

loans.name: Ñañopytyvomba Ii Group

texts.es:
El comité Ñañopytyvomba II se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santani. Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan las actividades de forma entusiasta y responsable. Es un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo.
Ellas se definen como luchadoras ya que por medio de su esfuerzo tratan de llevar a sus casas el pan de cada dia. El objetivo de todas ellas es brindarle a sus familias una vida digna.
La Sra. Mirian se dedica a la venta de ropas, comenta que ya tiene muchos clientes por los varios años que ya lleva dentro del negocio. Tiene mucha demanda, principalmente en la época de invierno.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de abrigos, bufandas, gorras y otras prendas de invierno.
texts.en:
The Ñañopytyvomba II Communal Bank was formed by the union of several neighbors in the city of Santine.  All of the members of the communal bank are responsibly and enthusiastically involved in their business activities.  It is a very united group that is capable of carrying out activities that strengthen their camaraderie.  

They are known as tenacious women because through their efforts they try to bring home their daily bread.  Their objective is to give their families a decent life.

Mirian sells clothes.  She says that she already has a lot of customers due the various years she has been in the business.  She has a lot of demand, primarily in the winter season.  She is requesting the loan to buy coats, scarves, hats, and other winter clothes.

loans.use: to buy winter clothes to later sell.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan es una persona muy optimista y trabajador, tiene 69 años y vive al lado de su esposa con el menor de sus 4 hijos en su casa propia. Toda su vida se ha dedicado a las tareas del campo y en sus 40 años de experiencia no ha dejado de ejercer la agricultura que tanto disfruta. Pero él tiene la voluntad de seguir adelante y mejorar, es por ello que se animó, hace 4 años, dedicarse también a la crianza de cuyes, que con la ayuda de su esposa trabajan día a día, cuidando a estos animales, y ahora pueden ver con satisfacción el fruto de su trabajo, pues sus cuyes han aumentado y eso le da M. ventaja para su comercialización y por ende sus ganancias. Cuando es temporada de siembra y cosecha, son sus hijos lo que se encargan del oficio. Su plan es continuar trabajando hasta que se le acabe las fuerzas. Es uno de los socios fundadores del banco comunal que integra y lo manifiesta con toda satisfacción  porque su grupo tiene 10 años de funcionamiento con miembros que son puntuales en sus pagos, por lo que sigue motivado para continuar accediendo a créditos que siempre las utiliza en las actividades agrícolas que desempeña. Con este dinero que solicita, comprará sacos de abono y cuyes de mejor raza.
texts.en:
Juan, age 69, is a very optimistic and hard-working person.  He lives in his own house with his wife and the youngest of his four children.

He has devoted his whole life to farm work.  During his 40 years of experience he has never stopped farming, which he enjoys so much.  He has the will to get ahead and to improve.  

That is why four years ago he was motivated to also raise guinea pigs.  His wife helps him work day to day taking care of these animals.  Now they can see, with satisfaction, the fruit of their labor.  Their guinea pigs have grown in number.  This gives then a great advantage in selling them and for their income.

When it is the season for sowing and harvesting, their children take charge of the job.  His plan is to continue working until he has no more strength.  He is one of the founding members of his communal bank.  He is totally satisfied because his group has been functioning for ten years with members who are punctual with their payments.  

That is why he continues to be motivated to continue accessing loans that he always uses for the agricultural work that he does.  He will use the requested loan to buy sacks of fertilizer and a better breed of guinea pigs.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer and a better breed of guinea pigs

loans.name: Dora Luz

texts.es:
La señora Dora Luz es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora de 65 años quien tiene un pequeño y modesto comedor desde hace 10 años en Ticuantepe. Ella lo inicio con pocos recursos y con el tiempo lo fue aumentando. Ella con el crédito comprara arroz, frijoles, aceite, pollo, carne…etc.
Ella tiene un nieto a su cargo a quién le ayuda en los estudios.
texts.en:
Dora Luz is a hard-working and enterprising 65 year old woman.  She has had a small and modest eatery in Ticuantepe for ten year.  She started it with few resources, and in time it got bigger.

She will use the loan to buy rice, beans, oil, chicken, and meat, etc.

She has a grandson under her care, and she helps with his education.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oil, chicken, and meat, etc.

loans.name: Héctor Emilio

texts.es:
A sus 59 años Héctor trabaja diariamente hasta las 12 de la media noche para sacar adelante a su familia, es padre de 2 hijos y desde hace 20 años dueño de una salsamentaria muy reconocida en por los habitantes de su barrio y barrios aledaños, no sólo por los años de experiencia si no también por que Héctor siempre se ha preocupado por brindar un buen servicio ya que es conciente que así sus clientes serán fieles al negocio.

Héctor sueña con que su microempresa sea el legado que pueda dejarle a sus nietos, dándole a su familia estabilidad económica y mejorando generosamente su calidad de vida. Se siente orgulloso de su negocio pero está en una constante lucha por ser cada vez mejor, por que sus clientes lo prefieran y por que el servicio sea completamente satisfactorio, y expresa que hasta el día de hoy lo ha logrado, sin embargo en estos momentos su negocio presenta negocios en sanidad, motivo por el cual deberá realizar adecuaciones locativas que se le están exigiendo y que sabe son necesarias para el buen funcionamiento de su negocio pero en este momento el no cuenta con el capital para realizar dichas adecuaciones, y solicita un préstamo que le ayude a mejorar su situación actual.
texts.en:
Héctor, age 59, works every day until 12 midnight in order to get his family ahead.  He has two children.  He has had a cured meats shop for 20 years.  It is widely known by the inhabitants of his neighborhood and bordering neighborhoods.  It is well-known not only for his years of experience, but also because Héctor always concerns himself with providing good service.  He does this because he is aware that this way his customers will be loyal to his business.

Héctor dreams that his small business will be the legacy that he will give his grandchildren.  This will give the family financial stability and will generously improve their quality of life.  He is proud of his business, but he is in a constant struggle to be continually better.  He does this so that his customers will prefer him because his service is completely satisfactory.  He has now achieved this.  

Nevertheless, he has some health department requirements he needs to fulfill. He knows that they are necessary so that his business functions well.  However, he does not now have the capital to make said adaptations.  He is requesting a loan the help him improve his current situation.

loans.use: to make adaptations to his business.

loans.name: Monica Vanesa

texts.es: La señora Mónica es cliente antiguo de la institución  ella vive en la zona de Bolonia en la casa de sus papas, ella tiene un pequeño hijito al cual esta criando sola ya que por el momento se encuentra separada de sus esposo, la Sra. Mónica tiene el sueño de volver a su pequeña tienda en un almacén ya que por la zona no existen muchas tiendas, su Mama es la que más le apoya ella tiene su pensión en Kupini y quiere ver  a su hija con su negocio ya establecido es por eso que pide el préstamo para la compra de mercadería para surtir su tienda con variedad de productos, como dulces, abarrotes, refrescos, y galletas, es una persona muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Mónica is a longtime client of the institution.  She lives in her parents’ house in the Bolonia zone.  She has a young son.  She is raising him alone because at the moment she is separated from her husband.

Mónic dreams of returning to her small store.  There are not many stores in the area.  Her mother is the one who supports her the most.  She has a boarding house in Kupini.  She wants to see her daughter with an established business.

That is why she is asking for a loan to buy merchandise to stock her store with a variety of products.  She will buy things like sweets, groceries, soft drinks, and cookies.  

She is a person who is very grateful for the support that has been given to her.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in order to stock her store with basic needs products.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El Señor Juan es casado, tiene 35 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pilar, tiene casa propia, donde posee las condiciones básicas para desarrollar su actividades dentro del seno familiar y movilidad propia.
El se dedica a la carpintería. Desarrolla esta actividad hace como 4 años, posee la insfraestructura necesaria para el desarrollo de esta actividad, ya sea maquinaría, herramientas, es muy reconocido en Pilar por la calidad y elaboración de sus muebles. Tiene el sueño de algún día poder ampliar aun mas su taller para poder seguir creciendo laboralmente.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de materia prima como ser maderas, barniz, pinceles. Agradece a la Fundación por el apoyo.
texts.en:
Juan is 35 years old and married.  He lives in the city of Pilar.   He owns his own house, which has the basic conditions necessary for him to carry out activities within the family nucleus; he also has his own vehicle.

He is a carpenter, and he has been doing this for four years.  He has the needed infrastructure, whether it be machinery or tools, to develop this business activity.  He is very well-known in Pilar for making furniture and for the quality of his work.

He has the dream that one day he will be able to expand his shop even more.  He wants to do this to be able to continue growing in his work.

He is requesting the loan to buy supplies like wood, varnish, and paintbrushes.  He is grateful to the Fundación for its support.

loans.use: to buy raw material like wood, varnish, and paintbrushes.

loans.name: Fuente De Amor 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Marie is one of the members of the “Fuente de amor” (Source of love) 1 & 2 group which has 10 micro-businesswomen. They are involved in clothing sales, natural products sales, shoe sales, food sales, etc. Marie lives in the city of La Romana. Its economy depends on tourism and the sugarcane industry. It also has a sizable population of Dominicans and Haitian immigrants who live in communities with very limited resources.

Marie is very excited to receive her second loan from Esperanza Internacional, having satisfactorily repaid her previous loan and taken an important step in her business’ growth. She has had her business for about three years; she started it with a loan she took. She is running a clothing sales business, and she is planning on investing the new loan in clothes like pants, blouses, shirts, underwear, etc. She sells them by walking around and from her house.

Marie’s family is made up of herself, her long-term partner and their five children; three of them live in her house. She tells us that her greatest challenge is to have her own house. She will use her profits to invest in her business and to save because she wants to make her dream come true, the one to own a house to share with her family.

loans.use: To buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Luz Del Día Group

texts.es:
El grupo Luz del Día lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras una de ellas es la señora Margarita de los Ángeles  de 47años comerciante de productos Avon, empresa reconocida por sus ventas vía catálogo. Además de este negocio con los préstamos puso una pequeña venta en la que invertirá el crédito con la compra de mercadería como granos básicos, chiverias, carne, huevo, pan...etc.
Los otros integrantes son José de 28 años propietario de un autolavado el cual inicio hace 5 años y Healy quien tiene un tramo en el mercado donde vende CD y chinelas, y por las tardes en su casa tiene una fritanga, realiza sopa y riega mercadería.
texts.en:
The “Luz del Día” (Light of Day) Communal Bank is comprised of three hard-working people.

Margarita de los Ángeles, age 47, is one of them.  She sells Avon products.  Avon is a company that is known for its catalog sales.  In addition to this business, she has used the loans to set up a small sales business.  She will use the loan to buy merchandise for this business, such as basic grains, snacks, meat, eggs, bread, etc.  

José, age 28, is also a member.  He has a car wash that he started five years ago.  The other member, Healy, has a vending station in the market where she sells CDs and slippers.  In the afternoons she sells fried food at her house, makes soup, and displays her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, snacks, and soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: El Sr. Mario y su esposa la Sra. Graciela llevan muchos años de casados, ellos viven en zona Radial de la cuidad de Santa Cruz, cuentan con casa propia en la cual  vive con 1 de sus hijos que aun es soltero y estudia y los otros cuatros ya tienen su familia a parte, EL Sr. Mario llego a nuestra oficina por referencia de un compañero de trabajo, Don Mario tiene un vehículo propio del cual tiene un chofer que lo trabaja haciendo servicios transporte urbano el cual le da renta diaria, Doña Graciela tiene una venta de pollo a la Broaster en su mismo domicilio y de esa manera le ayuda a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, el crédito será destinado para el mantenimiento de su vehículo (Chapería en general), "estamos muy agradecidos con su institucion ya que depositaron su confianza en nosotros" dijeron.
texts.en:
Mario and his wife, Graciela, have been married for many years.  They live in the Santa Cruz’s Radial Zone.  They have their own house, and they live with one of their sons.  He is still single and goes to school.  The other four already have their own separate families.

Mario came to our office because he was referred by a work colleague.  Mario has his own vehicle.  He has a driver who works providing urban transportation services.  This gives him his daily income.

Graciela sells broasted chicken in her own home.  That way she helps her husband with the household expenses.

The loan is for maintenance on his vehicle (general sheet metal work).

“We are very grateful to the institution that has placed their trust in us,” they said.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance on his vehicle (general sheet metal work).

loans.name: Divino Maestro Group

texts.es: Duo Divino Maestro: Este duo esta integrado por doña Elma Quien el la lider del duo ella se dedica a la venta y a la elavoracion de guipiles desde ya hace varios años ella nos cuenta que es un negocio que le ha ayudado mucho porque le a dejado bonita ganacias pero no le alcanza para comprar la materia prima nesesaria para seguir confeccionando sus tejidos ella esta consiente de que le falta capital por eso esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia perima para la confeccion de tejidos para sequir con su negocio al iguia que la siguiente socia tambien se dedica a la venta y elavoracion de tejidos,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de matria prima para la confeccion de tejidos,
texts.en: Duo Divino Maestro:  Doña Elma is a member of this duo. She is the leader of the two and has worked in the sale and production of huipiles [traditional Mayan dresses] for several years.  She tells us that it is a business that has helped her a great deal because it has provided her with a nice income.  However she does not earn enough to buy the raw material she needs to continue her weaving.  She is aware that she lacks capital and is therefore requesting a loan to buy raw material to make woven goods in order to continue with her weaving business. It is the same with the other member of the duo. She, too, is dedicated to the sale and production of woven goods and is requesting this loan to buy raw material for weaving.

loans.use: To buy raw material for weaving.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El comité denominado La Esperanza, es de la ciudad de San Lorenzo. Cuenta actualmente con 17 miembros. Todas ellas trabajan activamente ya que saben que el trabajo es la única forma de salir adelante. Todas ellas tienen un propósito en común, y es procurar por un futuro mejor para sus familiares. El requisito esencial de este comité es la unidad, ya que son solidarias las unas con las otras.
La Sra. Primitiva se dedica a la venta de leche, ella cuenta que su trabajo es muy sacrificado, ya que todos los días se levanta a muy tempranas horas para repartir la leche, para que a la hora del desayuno ya esté en la mesa de sus clientes. Sueña con algún día pode tener una lecheria donde vender su producto.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de mas leche, ya que por cantidad le sera mas económico, y gracias a esto su margen de ganancia sera mayo.
texts.en:
The “La Esperanza” (The Hope) Communal Bank is in the city of San Lorenzo.  It currently has 17 members.  They all actively work because they know that the work is the only way to get ahead.  All of them have the same purpose, and that is to get a better future for their families. The essential requirement of this communal bank is unity because they are supportive of one another.

Primitiva sells milk.  She says that her work is very self-sacrificing because she gets up very early every day in order to deliver the milk.  She does this so that it is on her customers’ tables at breakfast time.

She dreams that one day she will be able to have a dairy where she can sell her product.

She is requesting the loan to buy more milk.  Buying in quantity is more economical.  Thanks to this, her profit margin will be greater.

loans.use: to buy milk to later sell.

loans.name: Hilario

texts.es: A unos 15 kilometros del municipio de Pueblo Nuevo se encuentra una comarca llamada Llanos 1, donde habita el señor Hilario de 48 años de edad, productor de café y también ganadero, esta casado y tiene un hijo de 18 años de edad. Desde muy temprana edad con su papá trabajaban en una finca cerca de su finca donde viven en la actualidad. Poco a poco se fueron superando y compraron su propia tierra con las cuales trabajan actualmente. ÉL solicitó su crédito para mantenimiento de café como es la compra de abono y pagar la mano de obra. Su mayor deseo es comprar más tierras, mejorar en alto ganado y hacer mejoras a su finca.
texts.en: Señor Hilario lives in a district called Llanos 1 located about 15 kilometers from the municipality of Pueblo Nuevo.  He is 48 years old, a coffee producer and also a cattleman and is married and has one son who is 18 years old.  From a very early age, he worked with his father on a farm near the farm where they now live.  They kept getting ahead, little by little, and bought their own land that they currently work on. He requested his loan to maintain coffee production, to buy fertilizer and to pay his work-force.  His greatest wish is to buy more land, greatly improve his cattle and make improvements on his farm.

loans.use: To maintain coffee production and pay labor costs

loans.name: Francy Marisol

texts.es: La Sra. Marisol vive en la zona Achachicala de la ciudad de la paz. Ella trabaja como peinadora desde hace veinte años. Tiene dos hijos en edad escolar y vive en la casa de su tía. Marisol llegó a nuestra institución ya que su tía era una cliente antigua y muy conocida. Uno de sus mayores deseos es poder ampliar su negocio y en esta ocasión solicita el préstamo de dinero para la compra de materiales de trabajo como ser tintes y champú. Marisol es una madre muy responsable ya que a pesar de estar separada de su esposo ella, trabaja mucho para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos. Espera poder ahorrar lo suficiente para que sus hijos tengan una buena educación superior.
texts.en:
Marisol lives in the city of La Paz’s Achachicala zone.  She has worked as a hairdresser for the last twenty years.  She has two school age children and lives in her aunt’s house.  

Marisol came to our institution because her aunt was a longstanding, well known client.  One of her greatest wishes is to enlarge her business and on this occasion is asking for a loan to buy work tools, like hair coloring and shampoo.  

Marisol is a very responsible mother who, despite being separated from her husband, works very hard to raise her children.  She hopes to save up enough so that her children can have good higher education.

loans.use: to buy hair coloring and beauty salon tools.

loans.name: Mujeres En Accion Group

texts.es:
El comité Mujeres en Acción nace hace más de tres años mediante la gestión y el apoyo de otro comité que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar. Este comité es de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, en estos más de dos años de intenso trabajo han crecido tanto social como económicamente. Son reconocidas en el lugar como mujeres muy trabajadoras. Ellas se unieron con el objetivo de ayudarse mutuamente y de esa manera generar mas ingresos para sus hogares.
La Sra. Nelly se dedica a la venta de bebidas hace ya unos años, es muy conocida en el barrio por todos sus vecinos. Se considera una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora. Le gustaría algún día poder ampliar mas su negocio.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra d mas bebidas, como ser gaseosas, cervezas y demás para el abastecimiento de su local de bebidas.
texts.en:
The “Mujeres en Acción” (Women in Action) committee was born over three years ago through the initiative and support of another committee that was working in the same place.  This committee is from the city of San Lorenzo.  In the more than two years of intense work it has grown both socially and economically.  They are known locally as very hard working women.  They joined together to mutually help each other out to generate more income for their homes.

Nelly has sold beverages for several years now.  She is very well known by folks in her neighborhood.  She considers herself to be a very hard working, tenacious woman.  She’d like to expand the business some day.

She asks for the loan to buy more beverages like soft drinks, beer and others to stock her establishment with beverages.

loans.use: to buy beverages like beer, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: Lourdes tiene 42 años, en las cuales siempre ha radicado en su lugar de origen Sicaya, en donde  vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en casa de un familiar. Tras arduos años de trabajo en el campo, decidió hace 20 años vender alfalfa, para ello arrienda terrenos cultivados de alfalfa y extrae el producto para venderlos a los comerciantes al por menor. Su trabajo diario consiste en extraer y repartir la alfalfa a los comerciantes y en esta labor sus hijos la ayudan. De manera paralela vende por las tardes, suplementos vitamínicos de una marca conocida en el mercado; mientras que en la mañana se dedica a la agrícultura. Ambas actividades le ha permitido  tener un ingreso más en beneficio para su familia, porque tiene mucha demanda por su comunidad, ya que vive en una zona rural que le permite conocer a sus clientes y darle un trato más personalizado en ambos negocios. En adelante quiere incrementar su capital de trabajo para arrendar más terrenos cultivados. Este será su décimo crédito con MFP, en todo este tiempo siempre ha demostrado puntualidad en sus pagos y  el cumplimiento en todos los acuerdos que se han dado en su banco comunal. Con el dinero que solicita,  lo invertirá para incrementar su capital de trabajo en ambos negocios, comprar semillas de alfalfa así como productos vitamínicos.
texts.en: Lourdes, 42, has always lived in Sicava, the place where she was born.  She lives there with her husband and their 2 children in the house of a relative.  After years of arduous work in the fields, she decided 20 years ago to sell alfalfa.  To do this she rents land to cultivate alfalfa, and harvests the product to sell to the retail vendors.  Her daily work consists of harvesting and distributing alfalfa to the traders, and her children help her with this work. In the mornings she works in agriculture, and in the afternoons she works on another business selling vitamin supplements of a brand that is well known in the market.  Both of these activities have allowed her to have a better income for her family, because there is a lot of demand for these products in her community.  Since she lives in a rural area, she knows her customers and is able to give them personalized service in both businesses.  In the future, she wants to  increase her working capital so that she can rent more croplands.  This will be her 10th loan with MFP, and in all of this time she has demonstrated punctuality in her payments and has complied with all of the agreements that have been decided upon in her communal bank.  With the money that she requests, she will increase her working capital for both businesses, buying alfalfa seeds and also vitamin products.

loans.use: to buy alfalfa seeds and vitamin products

loans.name: Duo Las Margaritas Group

texts.es: Duo Las margaritas: Margarita es la lider del Grupo ella se dedica a la venta D. productos comestibles desD. ya hace varios años, ella nos cuenta que esta contenta porque poco a poco a salido adelante en su negocio y sus clientes pococ a poco ban aumentando esta solicitando este credito para la compra  D. productos comestibles para surtir mas su negocio ya que sus clientes le piden productos que ella no tiene entonces esta convencida D. que le falta capital para trabajar.al igual que la siguiente socia ella se dedica a la crianza D. animales y esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. animales para crianza.
texts.en:
'Las Margaritas' Group.

Margarita is the leader of this group.  She has been selling food products for several years.  She tells us that she is happy because she has gradually gotten ahead in her business and her number of customers has gradually increased.  She is requesting this loan to buy food products so that she can further stock her business as her customers ask her for products that she doesn't have.  She is certain that she needs more capital to work.

The other member of this group raises animals.  She is requesting this loan to buy animals to raise.

loans.use: to buy food products to sell

loans.name: Fe Group

texts.es:
El grupo Fe lo conforman tres mujeres trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es la señora Norma de 39 años, ella inicio con la venta de verduras y con las ganancias y los créditos puso una fritanga y vende sopa los fines de semana. Ella con este negocio ha sacado adelante a sus seis hijos de los cuales los dos menores son los que están a su cargo.
Las otras integrantes son Hessell de 25 años comerciante de ropa y productos zermat  y Misael es propietario de un taxi desde hace 7 años y con el crédito le dará mantenimiento al vehículo.
texts.en:
The group Fe (Faith) comprises three hardworking entrepreneurial people. One of them is 39-year old Sra. Norma. She started out selling vegetables, and with the profit and some loans opened a restaurant selling soup at weekends.

Norma has used her earnings from this business to support her six children, the two youngest of whom she is still responsible for. 

The other members of the group are 25-year old Hessell who sells clothing and Zermat products, and Misael who has owned a taxi for seven years. He plans to spend the loan money maintaining his vehicle

loans.use: to buy vegetables, basic grains, cheese, meat etc.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
La Sra. Olga  esta casada con el Sr.Amadeo con quien tienen dos Hijos, los cuales están estudiando en el Nivel Secundario. Tienen una casa propia.
La Sra Olga se dedica a la venta D. Joyas en Plata y Oro. Por medio D. este trabajo ella ha conseguido mantenerse y solventar los gastos D. la casa, con la ayuda D. su marido. Ella comenta que es una profesión muy linda y que le encanta.
Ella se considera una mujer muy sacrificada y trabajadora. Todo lo que hace es para ver, algún día, a sus hijos terminando una carrera universitaria.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra D. mas joyas, para D. esa forma poder innovar con mas variedad. Quiere comprar mas cadenas, pulseras y anillos.
texts.en:
Sra. Olga is married to Sr. Amadeo and they have two children who are secondary school students. They own their own home. 
Olga sells silver and gold jewelry. She uses her earnings to support the household with help from her husband. She says that jewelry selling is a great business to be in and she really enjoys it.

Olga is considered a selfless and hardworking woman. All that she does is so that she can see, one day, her children get to university. 

She is seeking a loan to buy more jewelry so she can stay current and have a greater variety to offer her customers. She wishes to buy more chains, bracelets, and rings.

loans.use: to buy more chains, bracelets, and rings etc.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.es: A sus 33 años, Milagros  sigue viviendo en su tierra natal con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. En la búsqueda de oportunidades de negocio y ante la recomendación de su suegra, Milagros se dedica en la elaboración de lechón al horno, de las cuales son ya 11 años de experiencia en sus ventas de éste alimento. Por ser un plato típico de su zona, sus ventas se han mantenido estables y siempre se asegura de tener  el ingrediente básico de su preparación que son los cerdos que compra los fines de semana para  luego beneficiarlos y prepararlos. Tiene su propio horno donde cocina, asimismo atiende pedidos de los clientes para grandes banquetes, así como aprovecha en vender en las ferias comerciales. Recibe la ayuda de su cuñada y de su suegra que también  venden, pues éste negocio lo considera muy rentable, que compensan el esfuerzo que pone. Su deseo es mejorar e implementar su negocio para que sus platillos sean de mejor calidad. Trabaja con MFP a través de los créditos grupales en 17 oportunidades de las cuales se siente muy orgullosa, demuestra su compromiso siendo parte de la junta directiva de su banco comunal que ha depositado la confianza hacia su persona y para ella es una gran satisfacción. El dinero que solicita lo invertirá en la reparación de su horno, ya que se ha derrumbado  por la mala construcción que han realizado en su horno y es urgente para ella reparar lo que considera su esencial herramienta de trabajo. Por el momento trabaja en el horno de su suegra, sin embargo se acerca la temporada en donde  hay mayores ventas.
texts.en:
Milagros is 33 years old and continues to live in the place in which she was born.  She lives in her own home with her husband and three children.

In search of business opportunities, and at the recommendation of her mother-in-law, Milagros started making oven-roasted suckling pig.  She now has 11 years experience in selling this food.  As it is a traditional dish in her area, her sales have remained stable and she always makes sure that she has the basic ingredient for her meal which are the pigs that she buys on weekends.  She then dresses them and prepares them.  Milagros has her own oven where she cooks.  She fills customers' orders for large events and also sells in the markets.  She is helped by her sister-in-law and her mother-in-law who also sell this product.  She considers the business to be very profitable and it rewards the effort that she puts in.  Her wish is to improve and stock her business so that she can prepare better-quality dishes.  

Milagros has been working with MFP through 17 group loans.  She feels very proud of this.  She shows her commitment by being a member of the board of directors of her community bank.  They have placed their trust in her and she feels very satisfied as a result.  Milagros will invest the money that she has requested in repairing her oven as it has collapsed owing to the bad way in which it was constructed.  It is urgent that she have it repaired as she considers it her essential work tool.  For the time being, she is working with her mother-in-law's oven.  However, the season when she makes most sales is approaching.

loans.use: to repair her oven

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Don Carlos tiene 49 años, está casado con la Sra.Rosa de 38 años, tiene  un  hijo,  ellos viven en casa propia.
El Sr. Carlos se dedica a la venta y producción de hortalizas, está en el ramo hace más de 20 años, actualmente cuenta con muy buena producción de tomates y de melón. Aprendió el arte del cultivo de su padre y luego de casarse se independizó de él, realizando los cultivos en su finca con muy buena producción.
Actualmente cuenta con clientela formada pues los compradores vienen a llevar sus productos de su chacra pues posee muy buena calidad de los mismos.
El solicita el credito para la compra de semillas y químicos para la preparación del suelo.
texts.en:
Carlos is 49 years old.  He is married to 38 year-old Rosa and has a son.  The family live in their own home.

Carlos produces and sells vegetables.  He has been in this line of work for 20 years.  He currently has a very good tomato and melon production.  He learned the art of farming from his father and, after he got married, he started working independently from his father, growing his crops on his farm with a very good production.

Carlos currently has an established customer base.  His buyers come to collect the products from his farm as they are very good quality.  He is requesting a loan to buy seeds and chemicals for preparing his soil.

loans.use: to buy seeds and chemicals to prepare his soil

loans.name: Luchando Por El Mañana Group

texts.es: Duo Luchando por el mañana. este duo esta entegrado por Ana Cristina: quien es la lider del duo ella se dedica a la venta de cosmeticos de toda clase,ella nos cuenta que nececita un credito ya que nececita comprar mas mercaderia como lo es cosmeticos ella se dedica a este negocio desde hace barios años ella piensa que con el credito que le otorguen podria comprar una cantidad mas grande y asi tener mas productos para ofrecer el sueño de ella es superarse y estar bien en un futuro, el otro socio esta solicitando este credito para la compra de repuestos para electrodomesticos y de la misma manera superarse.
texts.en:
The pair known as “Luchando por el Mañana” (Fighting for Tomorrow) is led by Ana Cristina, who sells all types of cosmetics. She says that she needs a loan to buy more merchandise, such as cosmetics. Ana has been in business for several years and believes this loan will help her buy a larger quantity of products so that she can have more to sell. Her dream is to be successful and to do well in the future.

The other member is requesting a loan to buy spare parts for household appliances, which will allow him to succeed in the same manner.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Solidario America Group

texts.es:
El grupo Solidario América lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras. El coordinador del grupo es el señor José Javier de 27 años quien trabaja en la construcción desde hace 10 años  como albañil y cuenta con dos trabajadores. Él con el crédito construirá su casa comprara los materiales arena, cemento, bloques…etc.
Los otros integrantes son Sheila es comerciante de variedades los cuales vende por encargo desde hace 5 años y Reyna de 39 años tiene una fritanga desde hace 7 años.
texts.en:
The 'América' solidarity group has three hard-working and entrepreneurial members.  The group's coordinator is 27 year-old José Javier who has been working in the building trade as a builder for 10 years.  He has two workers.  He will use this loan to build his own house.  He will buy sand, cement, blocks, etc.

The other members of this group are Sheila, who has been selling a variety of merchandise to order for five years, and 39 year-old Reyna, who has owned a fried food joint for seven years.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies (cement, sand, blocks, etc.)

loans.name: María

texts.es:
La señora María Dolores de 27 años es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien inicio hace 3 años con el comercio de productos Avon, empresa reconocida por sus ventas vía catálogo  con las ganancias y los  prestamos invirtió en ropa y aumento su negocio.
Ella con el crédito comprara mercadería para mejorar su negocio y seguir creciendo. La meta de María Dolores es mejorar su casa y que su hijo estudie y llegue hacer un profesional.
texts.en:
María Dolores is 27 years old.  She is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman who started selling Avon products three years ago.  This is a company which is well known for their catalog sales.  With her profits and loans, she invested in clothes and increased her business.
