She has a plot of land suitable for raising cattle on.  She would like to manage to produce milk for her household's consumption and sell the rest to make additional income.  Her goal is to make profits so that, if things go well in the future, she will be able to continue buying dairy cows,  increase her production and make more profits for her family.

This is María Pilar's second loan from FUDECOSUR.  She has not received any previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have given her this loan with easier repayment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Angela Rosa

texts.es:
La señora Angela Rosa es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien con $20 dólares inicio su pequeña venta. En un inicio solo comercializaba meneítos, cajeta, bombones…etc. luego poco a poco la fue levantando surtiéndola con más productos como huevo, fósforos, papel higiénico, azúcar, arroz…etc.
El crédito invertirá en reforzamiento del negocio con la compra de nuevos productos para surtir más la venta.
texts.en:
Angela Rosa is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman who started her small sales business with just $20.  At first she only sold Meneítos (snack food), 'cajeta' (dulce de leche), candies, etc.  However, she gradually increased her business, stocking it with more products such as eggs, matches, toilet paper, sugar, rice, etc.

Angela Rosa will invest her loan in strengthening her business by purchasing new products to further stock her store.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, snacks, soda, etc.

loans.name: Resolución Group

texts.es:
El grupo Resolución lo conforman tres mujeres trabajadoras y emprendedoras, una de ellas es la señora Jesenia Raquel de 32 años quien es comerciante de ropa desde hace 5 años el cual inicio con unos cuantos encargos y con los créditos empezó a vender más.
Las otras integrantes son Erika de 33 años se dedica al comercio de mariscos desde hace 16 años y Yasmina del Socorro  desde hace 30 años quien se dedica al comercio de ropa desde hace 7 años.
texts.en:
The 'Resolución' group has three hard-working and entrepreneurial members.  One of them is 32 year-old Jesenia Raquel who has been selling clothes for five years.  She started out with a few orders and, with the help of loans, she started selling more.

The other members of the group are 33 year-old Erika, who has been selling seafood for sixteen years, and 30 year-old Yasmina del Socorro, who has been selling clothes for seven years.

loans.use: to buy clothes

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “REYNA DE LOS ANGELES DE URQUILLOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Tomasa; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de pollos, ella vende en forma ambulatoria llevando a diferentes lugares como Urubamba y Calca, ella los pollos los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende al por mayor, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de pollos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pollos y alimentos para los pollos.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Tomasa is a member of the "Reyna de los Ángeles de Urquillos" community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province and Cusco department. 

Tomasa is 38 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business raising chickens.  She makes her sales as an itinerant vendor, transporting her goods to different places such as Urubamba and Calca.  She fattens and grows her chickens and then sells them wholesale.  Through this business, she gets her children ahead in life.  She would like to expand her chicken business and is requesting a loan to buy chickens and chicken feed.

Tomasa is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy chickens and chicken feed

loans.name: Yovana

texts.es: Yovana tiene 37 años, convive con Manuel, de 39 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Jomira, de 14 y Máyela, de 9 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Cumutay. Desde joven aprendió a trabajar la tierra; pues la actividad comercial de la zona es la agricultura. Desde entonces todas las mañanas, muy temprano se dedica al cuidado de sus cultivos. Los que cuida desde que tenia 18 años; ahí siembra papa, arveja y maíz; los que después de cada cosecha los comercializa en el mercado central de Tarma, pero según afirma en épocas de campaña agrícola, los mismos comerciantes visitan la localidad de Huasahuasi, para negociar su producción. Lo que más le gusta a Yovana, es fertilizar sus cultivos, para que le proporcionen buenos frutos, ya que en tiempos de lluvia necesitan mayores cuidados. Como tratar la tierra y brindar a los alimentos mayores nutrientes. Ahora ella desea invertir en la compra de más terrenos agrícolas, ya dio el primer paso, comprando un pequeño terreno paralelo a de su casa. Y a pesar de que hace poco salió del hospital, ya que se operó de una hernia, desea con muchas ansias seguir con sus objetivos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pioneros de Cunutay” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para lograr sus objetivos. Además se compromete en no defraudar su confianza, pagando de manera puntual sus cuotas. Yovana de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de semilla de arveja y papa; para su próxima siembra.
texts.en:
Yovana is 37 years old and lives with 39 year-old Manuel.  The couple have two children: 14 year-old Jomira and 9 year-old Máyela.  They live together as a family in their own home which is located in the small village of Cumutay.

Yovana learned to work the land when she was young as the main business activity in her area is agriculture.  Very early every morning she goes out and cares for her crops.  She has been caring for her crops since she was 18 years old.  She grows potatoes, peas and corn.  After each harvest, she sells her produce in the central market in Tarma.  However, she says that during the farming seasons, sellers visit the town of Huasahuasi to sell their produce.

What Yovana most enjoys is fertilizing her crops so that they provide good fruit.  They need more care during rainy periods such as treating the land and providing more nutrients.  Yovana would like to invest in buying more farmland.  She already took her first step, buying a small plot of land parallel to her home.  In spite of the fact that she only recently got out of hospital where she had a hernia operation, she is very keen to continue achieving her goals.

Yovana belongs to the "Pioneros de Cumutay" (Cumutay Pioneeers) community bank and this is her first loan from MFP.  She hopes to receive a small loan to help her achieve her goals.  She pledges not to betray the trust that has been placed in her and will make her repayments on time.  With your support, Yovana will invest the money she has requested to buy pea and potato seeds for her next sowing season.

loans.use: to buy pea seeds and potatoes

loans.name: Joselo

texts.en:
Joselo owns a well-known health center that provides acupuncture services, massage therapy, nutritional courses and other innovative health services. He graduated from the Swedish Institute School of Acupuncture and Oriental Medicine and has been working in this field since 1998. He decided to open his own business last year and was shocked by how fast it took off. The community he serves has quickly learned of his services and he strives to make acupuncture an affordable healing method for anyone who is interested. 

With this loan from ACCION USA, Joselo will purchase health equipment and make some small decorative upgrades in the office to improve its ambiance.

loans.use: to purchase health equipment and make small decorative upgrades in the office

loans.name: Epifania

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “REYNA DE LOS ANGELES DE URQUILLOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Epifania; ella tiene 29 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de animales menores como pollos, cuyes y chanchos y la socia también se dedica a la agricultura donde tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra maíz y los animales lo vende en las diferentes ferias que existe en la provincia de Urubamba, su esposo trabaja vendiendo el maíz llevando a diferentes lugares como Calca, Anta y Urubamba, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de crianza de animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar animales y alimentos para los animales.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This member belongs to the communal bank "Reyna de los Angeles de Urquillos" which is located in the Urubamba district, in the Urubamba province, in the department of Cusco.  The member, Mrs. Epifania, is 29 years old, married, and has three children.  She divides her time between taking care of her daily chores and her business selling small animals like chickens, guinea pigs, and pigs.  She is also a farmer and plants corn on some land she has.  She sells the animals at various fairs around the Urubamba province.  Her husband works selling corn he takes to different places like Calca, Anta, and Urubamba.  The member wants to grow her animal raising business so she is taking out a loan to buy animals and feed for animals.  The member is happy about the loan and promises to comply with her payments.

loans.use: This member is taking out a loan to buy animals and animal feed.

loans.name: Gregory

texts.en:
Gregory has owned and managed his answering service/business center, Golden Touch Answering Service, for three years. The business, which provides answering services 24 hours a day/ 7 days a week, mainly caters to doctors and other medical groups with on-call hours. Gregory’s business has been very successful with 55 accounts and over 250 doctors who participate. Gregory is very dedicated to his business and recently decided to work a second job at a bakery to earn more money to invest into his business. He currently has one part-time employee whose availability is dependent on demand and cash flow.

With this loan from ACCION USA, Gregory will be able to pay another part-time employee. He hopes his growing staff will increase efficiency and create a greater client base.

loans.use: to hire another part-time employee

loans.name: Christina

texts.en:
Christina started a home-based tutoring business, Golden Apple Tutors, almost five years ago. Her business allows tutors to provide after-school tutoring. Aside from the one-on-one, multi-subject tutoring, Christina also provides SAT prep classes and other prep group classes. She has a variety of clients ranging from government entities such as private clients, Catholic Charities, the Archdiocese of Miami, and other non-profit organizations. Recently she was approved by the State and Department of Education to provide tutoring and education services in 2011-2012 free of charge for clients. Christina is constantly growing and reinventing herself in order to increase profits by developing new partnerships. 

With this loan from ACCION USA, Christina will be purchasing materials to market her own business and the new partnerships that she has established. Christina’s partnerships show her strength as a business owner and her reputation in the field. 

For more information about Christina’s business, visit: www.goldenappletutors.com

loans.use: to purchase materials to market her own business and the new partnerships that she has established

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Flora

texts.es: La señora Flora es contadora y tiene su propia consultora. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de dos computadoras ya que sufrió un asalto y se robaron las computadoras que tenia en su oficina. Vive en anticrítico en una casa la misma queda ubicada en la zona de San Pedro en la ciudad de La Paz; es divorciada y tiene tres hijos. Esta es la primera vez que solicita un crédito de IMPRO y de Kiva.
texts.en: Flora is an accountant and has her own business. The loan she is requesting will be used to purchase computers, after she suffered a robbery and lost the computers she had in her office.  She lives in a house located in the zone of San Pedro, in the city of La Paz.   Flora is divorced and has 3 children.  This is her first loan request with IMPRO and with Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase several computers to replace those that were stolen from her office

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose has owned and managed his travel agency since 1992, becoming reputable in his community for serving the Cape Verde population. By charging a flat fee for tickets and paying a wholesaler, Jose is able to help immigrants, largely from Cape Verde, visit family members back home. He has watched his business flourish as a result of e-tickets. Although he has had much success as a business owner, Jose has personally felt the effects of the economic crisis. Traveling has decreased overall and many individuals have stopped purchasing airline tickets.

With this loan from ACCION USA, Jose will purchase a sign for the front of his business and make some small-scale aesthetic upgrades. It is important to Jose to continue running a productive business and serving the community that he is closest to.

loans.use: to purchase a business sign and make small-scale aesthetic upgrades
